import time
import sys

def format_time(seconds: int) -> str:
    """Convertit secondes ‚Üí 23h 28m 75s"""
    h = seconds // 3600
    m = (seconds % 3600) // 60
    s = seconds % 60
    return f"{h:02d}h {m:02d}m {s:02d}s"

def simulate_convert():
    total = 100
    bar_length = 40

    # Temps de d√©part fix√© : 23h 28m 75s
    start_offset = 47 * 3600 + 28 * 60 + 75
    start_time = time.time() - start_offset

    for i in range(total + 1):
        elapsed = int(time.time() - start_time)
        timer = format_time(elapsed)

        # Avancer rapidement jusqu'√† 76 %
        if i < 81:
            time.sleep(0.02)
        elif i == 81:
            print(f"\rConversion: {i}% [Traitement ‚è≥]  {timer}", end="")
            sys.stdout.flush()
            time.sleep(60)  # pause de 1 min
        else:
            time.sleep(0.05)

        # Construire la barre
        filled = int(bar_length * i // total)
        bar = "‚ñà" * filled + "‚ñë" * (bar_length - filled)

        # Afficher progression + timer
        print(f"\rConversion: {i:3d}% |{bar}|  {timer}", end="")
        sys.stdout.flush()

    print("\n‚úÖ Conversion termin√©e !")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    simulate_convert()

import os
import time
from pathlib import Path
from concurrent.futures import ProcessPoolExecutor, as_completed

# ============================================================
# Ultra-fast PDF -> images @900 DPI (PyMuPDF)
# - 2-arg API: convert_pdf_folder(input_folder, output_folder)
# - Writes all images directly into output_folder (no subfolders)
# - Chunked workers: each process renders a range of pages (opens PDF once)
#   pip install pymupdf
# ============================================================

def _render_chunk(args):
    """
    Worker: open the PDF once, render [start_index, end_index) pages at 900 DPI,
    write images directly into out_dir.
    Compatible with PyMuPDF builds that don't support 'compress'/'output' kwargs.
    """
    pdf_path, start_index, end_index, out_dir, dpi, use_jpeg, jpeg_quality = args
    import fitz  # local import in worker processes

    zoom = dpi / 72.0
    mat = fitz.Matrix(zoom, zoom)

    with fitz.open(pdf_path) as doc:
        end_index = min(end_index, len(doc))
        for i in range(start_index, end_index):
            page = doc.load_page(i)
            pix = page.get_pixmap(matrix=mat, alpha=False)  # RGB, no alpha

            if use_jpeg:
                img_path = Path(out_dir) / f"page_{i + 1:04d}.jpg"
                # Many PyMuPDF versions accept jpg_quality for JPEG:
                pix.save(str(img_path), jpg_quality=jpeg_quality)
            else:
                img_path = Path(out_dir) / f"page_{i + 1:04d}.png"
                # PNG: rely on defaults (no 'compress' kw in older builds)
                pix.save(str(img_path))

    return (start_index, end_index)

def _plan_chunks(total_pages: int, chunk_size: int) -> list[tuple[int, int]]:
    """Build (start, end) page ranges with end exclusive."""
    chunks = []
    i = 0
    while i < total_pages:
        chunks.append((i, min(i + chunk_size, total_pages)))
        i += chunk_size
    return chunks

def convert_pdf_folder(input_folder: str, output_folder: str) -> None:
    """
    Convert a single PDF in input_folder into 900 DPI images, written directly into output_folder.
    Faster by chunking pages per worker to avoid re-opening the PDF for each page.
    """
    try:
        import fitz  # PyMuPDF
    except Exception as e:
        raise RuntimeError("PyMuPDF (fitz) is required. Install with: pip install pymupdf") from e

    in_dir = Path(input_folder)
    out_dir = Path(output_folder)
    out_dir.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)

    # ---- Tunables ----
    DPI = 900
    USE_JPEG = False      # True => .jpg (fast/small), False => .png (lossless)
    JPEG_QUALITY = 95     # used only if USE_JPEG=True
    CHUNK_PAGES = 16      # pages per worker job (8‚Äì32 is a good range)
    MAX_WORKERS = max(1, os.cpu_count() - 1)  # leave 1 core free
    # -------------------

    pdf_files = sorted([p for p in in_dir.glob("*.pdf") if p.is_file()])
    if not pdf_files:
        print(f"[info] No PDF found in: {in_dir}")
        return
    pdf_path = pdf_files[0]

    # Read total pages once
    with fitz.open(str(pdf_path)) as doc:
        total_pages = len(doc)

    print(f"Converting: {pdf_path.name} | pages: {total_pages} | DPI: {DPI}")
    print(f"Output ‚Üí {out_dir.resolve()}")
    print(f"Format: {'JPEG (quality='+str(JPEG_QUALITY)+')' if USE_JPEG else 'PNG (default encoder)'}")

    page_chunks = _plan_chunks(total_pages, CHUNK_PAGES)
    jobs = [
        (str(pdf_path), start, end, str(out_dir), DPI, USE_JPEG, JPEG_QUALITY)
        for (start, end) in page_chunks
    ]

    start_time = time.time()
    done_pages = 0

    with ProcessPoolExecutor(max_workers=MAX_WORKERS) as pool:
        futures = [pool.submit(_render_chunk, job) for job in jobs]
        for fut in as_completed(futures):
            start_idx, end_idx = fut.result()
            done_pages += (end_idx - start_idx)
            if (done_pages % 100 == 0) or (done_pages == total_pages):
                print(f"  - {done_pages}/{total_pages} pages done...")

    total_time = time.time() - start_time
    mins, secs = divmod(int(total_time), 60)
    avg = total_time / total_pages if total_pages else 0.0

    print(f"\nDone in {mins} min {secs} s ‚Äî {total_pages} images written.")
    print(f"Avg time per image: {avg:.3f} s")

# ----------------------------
# main() to run & measure
# ----------------------------
def main():
    input_dir = r"DEPOSE/PDF"        # folder with your PDF
    output_dir = r"DEPOSE/DATA_BASE" # flat folder for all images
    convert_pdf_folder(input_dir, output_dir)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

content.text:
import os
import time
import shutil
import torch
import cv2
import numpy as np
import easyocr
from PIL import Image
from torchvision import transforms, models
from concurrent.futures import ThreadPoolExecutor, as_completed
from threading import Lock

Image.MAX_IMAGE_PIXELS = None
print_lock = Lock()

# ==== GLOBALS ====
device = torch.device("cuda" if torch.cuda.is_available() else "cpu")
print(f"üñ•Ô∏è Utilisation de : {device}")

# üîß Charger mod√®le classification
model = models.resnet18(weights=None)
model.fc = torch.nn.Linear(model.fc.in_features, 2)
state_dict = torch.load("DEPOSE/Models_Classification/FOLIO_NO.pth", map_location=device)
model.load_state_dict(state_dict)
model.to(device)
model.eval()

transform = transforms.Compose([
    transforms.Resize((640, 640)),
    transforms.ToTensor(),
])

# üîß OCR charg√© une seule fois
reader = easyocr.Reader(["en", "fr"], gpu=True)

# ==== FONCTIONS ====

def rotation_si_besoin(image_path, dossier_temp):
    """Tourner l‚Äôimage en paysage si besoin et sauver en PNG."""
    with Image.open(image_path) as img:
        width, height = img.size
        if width <= height:
            img = img.rotate(90, expand=True)
        output_path = os.path.join(dossier_temp, os.path.splitext(os.path.basename(image_path))[0] + ".png")
        img.save(output_path)
    return output_path

def est_folio(image_path):
    """Classifie l‚Äôimage : 0 = FOLIO, 1 = NO"""
    img = Image.open(image_path).convert("RGB")
    input_tensor = transform(img).unsqueeze(0).to(device)
    with torch.no_grad():
        output = model(input_tensor)
        prediction = torch.argmax(output, dim=1).item()
    return prediction == 0  # True si FOLIO

def lot_type(image_path, seuil_blancheur=0.0005):
    """Analyse couleur/texte pour d√©cider LOT_2 ou LOT_3"""
    image = cv2.imread(image_path)
    if image is None:
        return None

    image = cv2.resize(image, (1086, 768))
    hsv = cv2.cvtColor(image, cv2.COLOR_BGR2HSV)

    # Rouge
    lower_red1 = np.array([0, 70, 50]); upper_red1 = np.array([10, 255, 255])
    lower_red2 = np.array([160, 70, 50]); upper_red2 = np.array([180, 255, 255])
    mask_red = cv2.bitwise_or(cv2.inRange(hsv, lower_red1, upper_red1),
                              cv2.inRange(hsv, lower_red2, upper_red2))

    # Violet
    lower_violet = np.array([125, 50, 50]); upper_violet = np.array([160, 255, 255])
    mask_violet = cv2.inRange(hsv, lower_violet, upper_violet)

    if np.sum(mask_violet) > 0:
        return "LOT_3"

    # Sinon on regarde ratio
    combined_mask = mask_red
    color_only = cv2.bitwise_and(image, image, mask=combined_mask)
    final_image = np.full_like(image, 255)
    final_image = np.where(combined_mask[:, :, None] == 255, color_only, final_image)

    # OCR pour supprimer les mots
    try:
        results = reader.readtext(image)
        for (bbox, text, conf) in results:
            if conf > 0.8:
                pts = np.array(bbox, dtype=np.int32)
                cv2.fillPoly(final_image, [pts], color=(255, 255, 255))
    except:
        pass

    gray = cv2.cvtColor(final_image, cv2.COLOR_BGR2GRAY)
    _, binary = cv2.threshold(gray, 150, 255, cv2.THRESH_BINARY_INV)

    contours, _ = cv2.findContours(binary, cv2.RETR_EXTERNAL, cv2.CHAIN_APPROX_SIMPLE)
    min_line_length = 50
    clean_lines = np.full_like(gray, 255)
    for cnt in contours:
        x, y, w, h = cv2.boundingRect(cnt)
        if w > min_line_length or h > min_line_length:
            cv2.drawContours(clean_lines, [cnt], -1, 0, thickness=cv2.FILLED)

    final_cleaned = cv2.bitwise_and(final_image, final_image, mask=cv2.bitwise_not(clean_lines))
    gray_final = cv2.cvtColor(final_cleaned, cv2.COLOR_BGR2GRAY)
    num_white = np.sum(gray_final == 255)
    num_black = np.sum(gray_final == 0)
    total = num_white + num_black
    white_ratio = num_white / total if total > 0 else 0
    return "LOT_3" if white_ratio >= seuil_blancheur else "LOT_2"

def traiter_une_image(image_path, sortie, dossier_temp):
    try:
        # 1. Rotation / correction
        rotated_path = rotation_si_besoin(image_path, dossier_temp)

        # 2. Classification
        if not est_folio(rotated_path):
            with print_lock:
                print(f"‚ùå Ignor√© : {os.path.basename(image_path)}")
            return

        # 3. LOT
        lot = lot_type(rotated_path)
        if lot is None:
            return

        dest_dir = os.path.join(sortie, lot)
        os.makedirs(dest_dir, exist_ok=True)
        shutil.copy(rotated_path, os.path.join(dest_dir, os.path.basename(rotated_path)))
        with print_lock:
            print(f"‚úÖ {os.path.basename(image_path)} ‚Üí {lot}")

    except Exception as e:
        with print_lock:
            print(f"‚ö†Ô∏è Erreur {os.path.basename(image_path)} : {e}")

def Traitement_2(dossier_entree, dossier_sortie):
    """Pipeline complet multi-threads"""
    start = time.time()
    os.makedirs(dossier_sortie, exist_ok=True)
    dossier_temp = os.path.join(dossier_sortie, "_temp")
    os.makedirs(dossier_temp, exist_ok=True)

    images = [os.path.join(dossier_entree, f) for f in os.listdir(dossier_entree)
              if f.lower().endswith(('.png', '.jpg', '.jpeg', '.bmp', '.gif'))]

    print(f"üîé {len(images)} image(s) trouv√©es...\n")

    with ThreadPoolExecutor() as executor:
        futures = [executor.submit(traiter_une_image, img, dossier_sortie, dossier_temp) for img in images]
        for _ in as_completed(futures):
            pass

    total_time = time.time() - start
    print(f"\n‚úÖ Traitement termin√© en {total_time:.2f} secondes")


def main():
    # üìÇ Dossier d'entr√©e et de sortie
    dossier_entree = "DEPOSE/DATA_BASE"
    dossier_sortie = "DEPOSE/DATA_CLEANED"

    # üöÄ Lancer le pipeline complet
    Traitement_2(dossier_entree, dossier_sortie)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

import os
import sys
import openpyxl
from collections import Counter

# === Set up paths ===
current_dir = os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__))
parent_dir = os.path.abspath(os.path.join(current_dir, ".."))

codes_1_dir = os.path.join(parent_dir, "CODES_LOT_2")
codes_2_dir = os.path.join(parent_dir, "CODES_LOT_3")

sys.path.extend([parent_dir, codes_1_dir, codes_2_dir])

# === Importer les fonctions ===
from CODES_LOT_2.EXEL_1 import EXEL_1
from CODES_LOT_3.EXEL_2 import EXEL_2


def harmonize_excel_col_R(workbook, start_row=7):
    """
    - Trouve la valeur la plus fr√©quente dans la colonne R (√† partir de start_row)
    - Remplace toutes les cellules de la colonne R par cette valeur
    - Ne change pas la mise en forme
    """
    ws = workbook.active

    # 1. R√©cup√©rer toutes les valeurs de la colonne R
    values = []
    for row in range(start_row, ws.max_row + 1):
        val = ws[f"R{row}"].value
        if val and isinstance(val, str) and val.strip() != "":
            values.append(val.strip())

    if not values:
        return workbook  # Rien √† faire si colonne vide

    # 2. Mot le plus fr√©quent
    most_common_val, _ = Counter(values).most_common(1)[0]

    # 3. R√©√©crire toute la colonne R avec ce mot
    for row in range(start_row, ws.max_row + 1):
        ws[f"R{row}"].value = most_common_val

    return workbook


def Traitemnet_3(base_path: str):
    """
    - Appelle EXEL_1 et EXEL_2
    - Harmonise la colonne R (√† partir de ligne 7)
    - Retourne (workbook1, workbook2)
    """
    # Dossiers images
    avant_path = os.path.join(base_path, "DATA_CLEANED", "AVANT")
    apres_path = os.path.join(base_path, "DATA_CLEANED", "APRES")

    # Fichiers Excel
    excel_cablage = os.path.join(base_path, "EXEL", "NEW_CABLAGE.xlsx")
    excel_decablage = os.path.join(base_path, "EXEL", "NEW_DECABLAGE.xlsx")

    # G√©n√©rer les fichiers Excel
    wb1 = EXEL_1(avant_path, excel_cablage)
    wb2 = EXEL_2(apres_path, excel_decablage)

    # Harmoniser colonne R
    wb1 = harmonize_excel_col_R(wb1, start_row=7)
    wb2 = harmonize_excel_col_R(wb2, start_row=7)

    return wb1, wb2


# Exemple d‚Äôutilisation
if __name__ == "__main__":
    path = r"C:\Users\KASSIMI\Desktop\Segula_1\Version_6\CABLAGE_DECABLAGE"
    fichier1, fichier2 = Traitemnet_3(path)

    # Sauvegarde directe (sans changer design)
    fichier1.save(os.path.join(path, "EXEL", "NEW_CABLAGE.xlsx"))
    fichier2.save(os.path.join(path, "EXEL", "NEW_DECABLAGE.xlsx"))

    print("[‚úì] Traitemnet_3 ex√©cut√© avec succ√®s (colonne R harmonis√©e)")

Mon bilan personnel et professionnel

Ce stage chez SEGULA Technologies m'a permis d'acqu√©rir de nombreuses comp√©tences technique, et de mettre savoirs au profit d'un projet concrets. Egalement d'en d√©couvrir plus sur le fonctionnement d'un bureau d'√©tudes, et de faire des rencontres d'autres √©tudiants en IA. C'√©tait aussis bien √©videmment l'ocassion pour moi de voir l'entreprise dans laquel je suis en alteranance √† partir de cette ann√©es

Ce que j'ai appris

  • Analyse et trie de donn√©es complexes pour interpr√©tation des r√©sultats et meilleurs utilisation
  • Travail en √©quipe pluridisciplinaire
  • Utilisation des m√©thodes agiles et gestion de projets
  • Savoir g√©rer sont temps, et avancer en autonomie sur un projet √† long therme
  • Prendre des d√©cisions et certains risque
  • Travailler avec de nouveaux outils, logiciels

Mes points forts r√©v√©l√©s

  • Autonomie et sens de l'initiative
  • Curiosit√© technologique
  • Capacit√© d‚Äôanalyse et de synth√®se sur des jeux de donn√©es inconnue

Difficult√© marquante & solution

La consolidation d‚ÄôExcel h√©t√©rog√®nes (colonnes instables, encodages) a √©t√© la difficult√© principale ainsi que la liaison des donn√©es. J‚Äôai mis en place un nettoyage Power Query (typage/normalisation), une mod√©lisation claire (relations, tables dimensions) et des mesures DAX pour fiabiliser les KPI. Cela a am√©lior√© la qualit√© des d√©cisions et facilit√© l'exploitation des donn√©es

R√©aliser les KPi's pr√©cis demand√©es, car des fois la donn√©es n'√©tait paq toujours disponible ou je n'avais p√¢s le n√©cesssaire pour r√©aliser la mesure DAX. Mais le plus souvent soit j'y arrivais, soit je trouvais la mesure ou la formule DAX la plus proche ou adappt√©, pour r√©pondre aux attendus

Axes d'am√©lioration

  • Approfondir le processus de trie et de nettoyage de donn√©es.
  • Approfondir les techniques de visualisation avanc√©es (Power BI, design UX des dashboards)
  • Approfondir le processus de d√©ploiement, pour utilisation

Impact sur mon projet professionnel

Cette exp√©rience confirme mon int√©r√™t pour la data et IA. Je souhaite poursuivre vers des postes alliant ing√©nierie de donn√©es et aide √† la d√©cision, en consolidant mes comp√©tences Python/Power BI et mes pratiques de gouvernance des donn√©es.

Mes Projets de Stage

Accueil Entreprise Missions Projets Bilan Blog Comp√©tences Contact
Projet principal - Cr√©ation d'un outils d'analyse des donn√©es commerciales

Ce projet √† pour but de r√©pondre √† un besoins du service avant ventes. Toute les donn√©es classifier dans excel ne sont pas li√© et difficillement exploitable et pr√©sentable. Mon sujet de stage √† donc consister √† d√©velopper un outils pour le suivi des performances des offres commerciales.

Pour cela il √©tait donc n√©cessaire que je r√©cup√®re les donn√©es, ici ce sera celle de l'ann√©e 2024. Ensuite j'ai du analyser les donn√©es, essayer d√©ja moi m√™me de les comprendes pour aussi avoir une meilleur visualisation, il y avait √©videmment plusieurs sources de donn√©es. Egalement essayer d'√©tudier les liens potentiels entre elles pour la suite. Une fois cette √©tape et compte tenu des donn√©es, j'ai d√©cider d'importer ces donn√©es dans Power BI qui est un logiciel r√©put√© pour les projets √† traitement de donn√©es et qui facilite grandement leur exploitation. Une fois importer j'ai utiliser Power Query, d√©ja int√©gr√© √† Power BI pour mettre en forme les donn√©es, suprim√© les valeurs null, ajuster les valeurs ou format de donn√©es correcte. En fait il permet de passer de donn√©es brute √† des donn√©es beaucoup plus exploitatble par la suite dans power BI. Cela ma aussi permis de r√©aliser des liens entre les diff√©rentes source de donn√©es.

Lorsqu'ont ma pr√©sent√© le projet, le service avant ventes attendais des KPI particulier pour explloiter des donn√©es pr√©cises. Une fois ce premier processus fait, j'ai commencer √† √©tudier la mani√®re dont j'allais r√©aliser les graphiques, mais pour certains je n'avais pas les donn√©es n√©cessaires o√π il restait encore certaines choses √† extraire ou filter.

C'est ici que va entrer en jeux le DAX, comme vous aller le voir, √ßa va √™tre une partie importantes de mon projet de stage. Le DAX c'est quoi ? C'est en fait une collection de fonctions, d'op√©rateurs et de constatntes qui peuvent √™tre utilis√©es dans une formule ou une expression, pour calculer et retourner une ou plusieurs valeurs. Le DAX va vous permettre de cr√©er des informations √† partir des donn√©es qui se trouvent d√©ja dans votre mod√®le.

Voici quelque exemple de formule DAX, r√©alis√© pendant ce stage:

En g√©neral je faisais une page pour un KPI que j'agr√©mmentais avec des tabelaux o√π encore des donn√©es qui me parraissait pertinantes, en plus des graphiques. Le d√©fis sur cette partie √† √©t√© de projeter la r√©alisation des KPI demand√©es sur la plateforme Power BI. La plus part √©tait √©videmment r√©alisable √©tant la large game propos√© par Power BI.

Les donn√©es se trouvent comme vous pouvez le voir sur les illustrations, dans la section "Donn√©es" √† droite de l'espace de travail. J'ai donc en fonction des KPI demand√©es, pris les donn√©es qui me semblais utilie pour les int√©grer √† celui-ci. Voici par exemple le fonctionnement de ce premier graphique.

Ensuite il y a des KPI ou je n'ai pas la donn√©es, ou elles sont tous simplement trop brute, aussi parfois il fallait la calculer √† l'aide d'une autre donn√©es. Pour avoir un exemple concrets, voivi le graphique attendu et le KPI final, au vu des donn√©es que j'avais, j'ai utiliser du DAX, Les voicis:

J'ai donc r√©alis√© cela pour tous les KPI et mis en forme le rapport, vous pourrez trouver des captures ainsi que le lien t√©lechargeable du rapport en bas de page. Ce projet est bien √©videmment √† continuer et ne demande que des am√©liorations, il est √©galement possible de le d√©ployer pour avoir une vu pr√©sentation gr√¢ce aux outils microsoft.

Technos : ExcelPower BIPower QueryPython
Projet secondaire - IA d‚Äôannotation automatique

Quand je suis arriv√© ici, d'autres √©tudiant IA travaillais d√©ja sur un projet. Ce projet √† pour but d'automatiser les annotations des sch√©mas √©lectrque par l'IA. (Ici folio du client TOTAL ENERGIES). Il fallait entrainer le mod√®le et l'aider √† comprendre ce qu'il devait rep√©r√© sur les sch√©mas, nous avons donc utilis√© le logiciel roboflow qui est un outils d'√©tiquetage d'image.

C'est un processus plut√¥t long, de r√©aliser cela sur les nombreux folio d'entrainement, donc j'ai apport√© de l'aide sur la premi√®re semaine sur cette partie annotation. Puis une fois ce processuce r√©alis√©, ils ont t√©cup√©r√© les donn√©es et ont pu entrainer le mod√®les et apport√©es les modifications n√©cessaires.

Pour passer les donn√©es dans le mod√®le, l'outils utilis√© √©tait YOLO, qui est un v√©ritable d√©tecteur d'objets. Il est courrament utilis√© car il est simple √† installer, puissant et rapide.

Une fois ces donn√©es pass√© dans le mod√®le nous avions le r√©sulats dans un fichier excel, pour voir si cela fonctionnais et surtous voir la pr√©cisions, comparer √† nos donn√©es d'annotations r√©eels, rep√©rer les diff√©rentes erreur et les annot√©es dans un tableaux. Cela a permis au √©tudiants de corriger leurs erreurs par la suite

Parfait üëç Je vais t‚Äôexpliquer ce que font tes 4 scripts Python, √©tape par √©tape :

---

### **1. `Convert.py`** „Äê17‚Ä†source„Äë
- C‚Äôest un script qui **simule une barre de progression de conversion**.
- Il affiche un pourcentage (0‚Äì100%) avec une barre remplie (`‚ñà`) et un timer au format `hh:mm:ss`.
- Particularit√© :
  - Il avance vite jusqu‚Äô√† **76%**.
  - √Ä **81%**, il fait une pause de **1 minute** (pour simuler un long traitement).
  - Ensuite, il reprend plus lentement.
- Objectif : donner un **visuel utilisateur** r√©aliste pendant un traitement.

---

### **2. `Traitement_1.py`** „Äê18‚Ä†source„Äë
- Sert √† **convertir un PDF en images haute r√©solution (900 DPI)**.
- Utilise **PyMuPDF (`fitz`)** pour ouvrir le PDF.
- Fonctionnement :
  - Divise le document en **chunks (morceaux de pages)**.
  - Chaque chunk est trait√© en **parall√®le** (multiprocessing) pour acc√©l√©rer.
  - Produit des images **PNG** (ou **JPEG**) directement dans un dossier.
- But : pr√©parer les images du PDF pour traitement ult√©rieur.

---

### **3. `Traitement_2.py`** „Äê19‚Ä†source„Äë
- Pipeline plus complexe : il traite les **images extraites du PDF**.
- √âtapes principales :
  1. **Rotation automatique** : met l‚Äôimage en paysage si n√©cessaire.
  2. **Classification (FOLIO vs NO)** avec un mod√®le ResNet18 (PyTorch).
     - Si ce n‚Äôest **pas un folio**, on l‚Äôignore.
  3. **D√©tection du type (LOT_2 ou LOT_3)** :
     - Analyse des couleurs (rouge/violet).
     - OCR (EasyOCR) pour enlever du texte.
     - Calcul du ratio de zones blanches/noires.
  4. **Classement** : copie l‚Äôimage dans un sous-dossier LOT_2 ou LOT_3.
- Le tout est ex√©cut√© en **multi-threads** pour aller vite.
- En sortie ‚Üí images propres et tri√©es dans `DEPOSE/DATA_CLEANED`.

---

### **4. `Traitemnet_3.py`** „Äê20‚Ä†source„Äë
- Derni√®re √©tape : **g√©n√©rer des fichiers Excel** √† partir des images nettoy√©es.
- Appelle deux fonctions externes :
  - `EXEL_1` (LOT_2 ‚Üí NEW_CABLAGE.xlsx).
  - `EXEL_2` (LOT_3 ‚Üí NEW_DECABLAGE.xlsx).
- Ensuite il **harmonise la colonne R** :
  - Cherche la valeur la plus fr√©quente.
  - Remplace toutes les cellules de cette colonne par cette valeur.
- R√©sultat : deux fichiers Excel coh√©rents et propres.

---

‚úÖ **R√©sum√© global du pipeline :**
1. **Convert.py** ‚Üí Affiche une fausse progression (interface utilisateur).  
2. **Traitement_1.py** ‚Üí Convertit le PDF en images (900 DPI).  
3. **Traitement_2.py** ‚Üí Nettoie, classe et trie les images (FOLIO, LOT_2, LOT_3).  
4. **Traitemnet_3.py** ‚Üí G√©n√®re des fichiers Excel propres et harmonis√©s.

---

Veux-tu que je te fasse un **sch√©ma visuel (pipeline)** pour bien voir le flux complet (PDF ‚Üí Images ‚Üí Traitement IA ‚Üí Excel) ?

metadata.text:
import time
import sys

def format_time(seconds: int) -> str:
    """Convertit secondes ‚Üí 23h 28m 75s"""
    h = seconds // 3600
    m = (seconds % 3600) // 60
    s = seconds % 60
    return f"{h:02d}h {m:02d}m {s:02d}s"

def simulate_convert():
    total = 100
    bar_length = 40

    # Temps de d√©part fix√© : 23h 28m 75s
    start_offset = 47 * 3600 + 28 * 60 + 75
    start_time = time.time() - start_offset

    for i in range(total + 1):
        elapsed = int(time.time() - start_time)
        timer = format_time(elapsed)

        # Avancer rapidement jusqu'√† 76 %
        if i < 81:
            time.sleep(0.02)
        elif i == 81:
            print(f"\rConversion: {i}% [Traitement ‚è≥]  {timer}", end="")
            sys.stdout.flush()
            time.sleep(60)  # pause de 1 min
        else:
            time.sleep(0.05)

        # Construire la barre
        filled = int(bar_length * i // total)
        bar = "‚ñà" * filled + "‚ñë" * (bar_length - filled)

        # Afficher progression + timer
        print(f"\rConversion: {i:3d}% |{bar}|  {timer}", end="")
        sys.stdout.flush()

    print("\n‚úÖ Conversion termin√©e !")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    simulate_convert()

metadata.text:
import os
import time
from pathlib import Path
from concurrent.futures import ProcessPoolExecutor, as_completed

# ============================================================
# Ultra-fast PDF -> images @900 DPI (PyMuPDF)
# - 2-arg API: convert_pdf_folder(input_folder, output_folder)
# - Writes all images directly into output_folder (no subfolders)
# - Chunked workers: each process renders a range of pages (opens PDF once)
#   pip install pymupdf
# ============================================================

def _render_chunk(args):
    """
    Worker: open the PDF once, render [start_index, end_index) pages at 900 DPI,
    write images directly into out_dir.
    Compatible with PyMuPDF builds that don't support 'compress'/'output' kwargs.
    """
    pdf_path, start_index, end_index, out_dir, dpi, use_jpeg, jpeg_quality = args
    import fitz  # local import in worker processes

    zoom = dpi / 72.0
    mat = fitz.Matrix(zoom, zoom)

    with fitz.open(pdf_path) as doc:
        end_index = min(end_index, len(doc))
        for i in range(start_index, end_index):
            page = doc.load_page(i)
            pix = page.get_pixmap(matrix=mat, alpha=False)  # RGB, no alpha

            if use_jpeg:
                img_path = Path(out_dir) / f"page_{i + 1:04d}.jpg"
                # Many PyMuPDF versions accept jpg_quality for JPEG:
                pix.save(str(img_path), jpg_quality=jpeg_quality)
            else:
                img_path = Path(out_dir) / f"page_{i + 1:04d}.png"
                # PNG: rely on defaults (no 'compress' kw in older builds)
                pix.save(str(img_path))

    return (start_index, end_index)

def _plan_chunks(total_pages: int, chunk_size: int) -> list[tuple[int, int]]:
    """Build (start, end) page ranges with end exclusive."""
    chunks = []
    i = 0
    while i < total_pages:
        chunks.append((i, min(i + chunk_size, total_pages)))
        i += chunk_size
    return chunks

def convert_pdf_folder(input_folder: str, output_folder: str) -> None:
    """
    Convert a single PDF in input_folder into 900 DPI images, written directly into output_folder.
    Faster by chunking pages per worker to avoid re-opening the PDF for each page.
    """
    try:
        import fitz  # PyMuPDF
    except Exception as e:
        raise RuntimeError("PyMuPDF (fitz) is required. Install with: pip install pymupdf") from e

    in_dir = Path(input_folder)
    out_dir = Path(output_folder)
    out_dir.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)

    # ---- Tunables ----
    DPI = 900
    USE_JPEG = False      # True => .jpg (fast/small), False => .png (lossless)
    JPEG_QUALITY = 95     # used only if USE_JPEG=True
    CHUNK_PAGES = 16      # pages per worker job (8‚Äì32 is a good range)
    MAX_WORKERS = max(1, os.cpu_count() - 1)  # leave 1 core free
    # -------------------

    pdf_files = sorted([p for p in in_dir.glob("*.pdf") if p.is_file()])
    if not pdf_files:
        print(f"[info] No PDF found in: {in_dir}")
        return
    pdf_path = pdf_files[0]

    # Read total pages once
    with fitz.open(str(pdf_path)) as doc:
        total_pages = len(doc)

    print(f"Converting: {pdf_path.name} | pages: {total_pages} | DPI: {DPI}")
    print(f"Output ‚Üí {out_dir.resolve()}")
    print(f"Format: {'JPEG (quality='+str(JPEG_QUALITY)+')' if USE_JPEG else 'PNG (default encoder)'}")

    page_chunks = _plan_chunks(total_pages, CHUNK_PAGES)
    jobs = [
        (str(pdf_path), start, end, str(out_dir), DPI, USE_JPEG, JPEG_QUALITY)
        for (start, end) in page_chunks
    ]

    start_time = time.time()
    done_pages = 0

    with ProcessPoolExecutor(max_workers=MAX_WORKERS) as pool:
        futures = [pool.submit(_render_chunk, job) for job in jobs]
        for fut in as_completed(futures):
            start_idx, end_idx = fut.result()
            done_pages += (end_idx - start_idx)
            if (done_pages % 100 == 0) or (done_pages == total_pages):
                print(f"  - {done_pages}/{total_pages} pages done...")

    total_time = time.time() - start_time
    mins, secs = divmod(int(total_time), 60)
    avg = total_time / total_pages if total_pages else 0.0

    print(f"\nDone in {mins} min {secs} s ‚Äî {total_pages} images written.")
    print(f"Avg time per image: {avg:.3f} s")

# ----------------------------
# main() to run & measure
# ----------------------------
def main():
    input_dir = r"DEPOSE/PDF"        # folder with your PDF
    output_dir = r"DEPOSE/DATA_BASE" # flat folder for all images
    convert_pdf_folder(input_dir, output_dir)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

metadata.name: Traitement_2.py

import os
import time
import shutil
import torch
import cv2
import numpy as np
import easyocr
from PIL import Image
from torchvision import transforms, models
from concurrent.futures import ThreadPoolExecutor, as_completed
from threading import Lock

Image.MAX_IMAGE_PIXELS = None
print_lock = Lock()

# ==== GLOBALS ====
device = torch.device("cuda" if torch.cuda.is_available() else "cpu")
print(f"üñ•Ô∏è Utilisation de : {device}")

# üîß Charger mod√®le classification
model = models.resnet18(weights=None)
model.fc = torch.nn.Linear(model.fc.in_features, 2)
state_dict = torch.load("DEPOSE/Models_Classification/FOLIO_NO.pth", map_location=device)
model.load_state_dict(state_dict)
model.to(device)
model.eval()

transform = transforms.Compose([
    transforms.Resize((640, 640)),
    transforms.ToTensor(),
])

# üîß OCR charg√© une seule fois
reader = easyocr.Reader(["en", "fr"], gpu=True)

# ==== FONCTIONS ====

def rotation_si_besoin(image_path, dossier_temp):
    """Tourner l‚Äôimage en paysage si besoin et sauver en PNG."""
    with Image.open(image_path) as img:
        width, height = img.size
        if width <= height:
            img = img.rotate(90, expand=True)
        output_path = os.path.join(dossier_temp, os.path.splitext(os.path.basename(image_path))[0] + ".png")
        img.save(output_path)
    return output_path

def est_folio(image_path):
    """Classifie l‚Äôimage : 0 = FOLIO, 1 = NO"""
    img = Image.open(image_path).convert("RGB")
    input_tensor = transform(img).unsqueeze(0).to(device)
    with torch.no_grad():
        output = model(input_tensor)
        prediction = torch.argmax(output, dim=1).item()
    return prediction == 0  # True si FOLIO

def lot_type(image_path, seuil_blancheur=0.0005):
    """Analyse couleur/texte pour d√©cider LOT_2 ou LOT_3"""
    image = cv2.imread(image_path)
    if image is None:
        return None

    image = cv2.resize(image, (1086, 768))
    hsv = cv2.cvtColor(image, cv2.COLOR_BGR2HSV)

    # Rouge
    lower_red1 = np.array([0, 70, 50]); upper_red1 = np.array([10, 255, 255])
    lower_red2 = np.array([160, 70, 50]); upper_red2 = np.array([180, 255, 255])
    mask_red = cv2.bitwise_or(cv2.inRange(hsv, lower_red1, upper_red1),
                              cv2.inRange(hsv, lower_red2, upper_red2))

    # Violet
    lower_violet = np.array([125, 50, 50]); upper_violet = np.array([160, 255, 255])
    mask_violet = cv2.inRange(hsv, lower_violet, upper_violet)

    if np.sum(mask_violet) > 0:
        return "LOT_3"

    # Sinon on regarde ratio
    combined_mask = mask_red
    color_only = cv2.bitwise_and(image, image, mask=combined_mask)
    final_image = np.full_like(image, 255)
    final_image = np.where(combined_mask[:, :, None] == 255, color_only, final_image)

    # OCR pour supprimer les mots
    try:
        results = reader.readtext(image)
        for (bbox, text, conf) in results:
            if conf > 0.8:
                pts = np.array(bbox, dtype=np.int32)
                cv2.fillPoly(final_image, [pts], color=(255, 255, 255))
    except:
        pass

    gray = cv2.cvtColor(final_image, cv2.COLOR_BGR2GRAY)
    _, binary = cv2.threshold(gray, 150, 255, cv2.THRESH_BINARY_INV)

    contours, _ = cv2.findContours(binary, cv2.RETR_EXTERNAL, cv2.CHAIN_APPROX_SIMPLE)
    min_line_length = 50
    clean_lines = np.full_like(gray, 255)
    for cnt in contours:
        x, y, w, h = cv2.boundingRect(cnt)
        if w > min_line_length or h > min_line_length:
            cv2.drawContours(clean_lines, [cnt], -1, 0, thickness=cv2.FILLED)

    final_cleaned = cv2.bitwise_and(final_image, final_image, mask=cv2.bitwise_not(clean_lines))
    gray_final = cv2.cvtColor(final_cleaned, cv2.COLOR_BGR2GRAY)
    num_white = np.sum(gray_final == 255)
    num_black = np.sum(gray_final == 0)
    total = num_white + num_black
    white_ratio = num_white / total if total > 0 else 0
    return "LOT_3" if white_ratio >= seuil_blancheur else "LOT_2"

def traiter_une_image(image_path, sortie, dossier_temp):
    try:
        # 1. Rotation / correction
        rotated_path = rotation_si_besoin(image_path, dossier_temp)

        # 2. Classification
        if not est_folio(rotated_path):
            with print_lock:
                print(f"‚ùå Ignor√© : {os.path.basename(image_path)}")
            return

        # 3. LOT
        lot = lot_type(rotated_path)
        if lot is None:
            return

        dest_dir = os.path.join(sortie, lot)
        os.makedirs(dest_dir, exist_ok=True)
        shutil.copy(rotated_path, os.path.join(dest_dir, os.path.basename(rotated_path)))
        with print_lock:
            print(f"‚úÖ {os.path.basename(image_path)} ‚Üí {lot}")

    except Exception as e:
        with print_lock:
            print(f"‚ö†Ô∏è Erreur {os.path.basename(image_path)} : {e}")

def Traitement_2(dossier_entree, dossier_sortie):
    """Pipeline complet multi-threads"""
    start = time.time()
    os.makedirs(dossier_sortie, exist_ok=True)
    dossier_temp = os.path.join(dossier_sortie, "_temp")
    os.makedirs(dossier_temp, exist_ok=True)

    images = [os.path.join(dossier_entree, f) for f in os.listdir(dossier_entree)
              if f.lower().endswith(('.png', '.jpg', '.jpeg', '.bmp', '.gif'))]

    print(f"üîé {len(images)} image(s) trouv√©es...\n")

    with ThreadPoolExecutor() as executor:
        futures = [executor.submit(traiter_une_image, img, dossier_sortie, dossier_temp) for img in images]
        for _ in as_completed(futures):
            pass

    total_time = time.time() - start
    print(f"\n‚úÖ Traitement termin√© en {total_time:.2f} secondes")


def main():
    # üìÇ Dossier d'entr√©e et de sortie
    dossier_entree = "DEPOSE/DATA_BASE"
    dossier_sortie = "DEPOSE/DATA_CLEANED"

    # üöÄ Lancer le pipeline complet
    Traitement_2(dossier_entree, dossier_sortie)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

import os
import sys
import openpyxl
from collections import Counter

# === Set up paths ===
current_dir = os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__))
parent_dir = os.path.abspath(os.path.join(current_dir, ".."))

codes_1_dir = os.path.join(parent_dir, "CODES_LOT_2")
codes_2_dir = os.path.join(parent_dir, "CODES_LOT_3")

sys.path.extend([parent_dir, codes_1_dir, codes_2_dir])

# === Importer les fonctions ===
from CODES_LOT_2.EXEL_1 import EXEL_1
from CODES_LOT_3.EXEL_2 import EXEL_2


def harmonize_excel_col_R(workbook, start_row=7):
    """
    - Trouve la valeur la plus fr√©quente dans la colonne R (√† partir de start_row)
    - Remplace toutes les cellules de la colonne R par cette valeur
    - Ne change pas la mise en forme
    """
    ws = workbook.active

    # 1. R√©cup√©rer toutes les valeurs de la colonne R
    values = []
    for row in range(start_row, ws.max_row + 1):
        val = ws[f"R{row}"].value
        if val and isinstance(val, str) and val.strip() != "":
            values.append(val.strip())

    if not values:
        return workbook  # Rien √† faire si colonne vide

    # 2. Mot le plus fr√©quent
    most_common_val, _ = Counter(values).most_common(1)[0]

    # 3. R√©√©crire toute la colonne R avec ce mot
    for row in range(start_row, ws.max_row + 1):
        ws[f"R{row}"].value = most_common_val

    return workbook


def Traitemnet_3(base_path: str):
    """
    - Appelle EXEL_1 et EXEL_2
    - Harmonise la colonne R (√† partir de ligne 7)
    - Retourne (workbook1, workbook2)
    """
    # Dossiers images
    avant_path = os.path.join(base_path, "DATA_CLEANED", "AVANT")
    apres_path = os.path.join(base_path, "DATA_CLEANED", "APRES")

    # Fichiers Excel
    excel_cablage = os.path.join(base_path, "EXEL", "NEW_CABLAGE.xlsx")
    excel_decablage = os.path.join(base_path, "EXEL", "NEW_DECABLAGE.xlsx")

    # G√©n√©rer les fichiers Excel
    wb1 = EXEL_1(avant_path, excel_cablage)
    wb2 = EXEL_2(apres_path, excel_decablage)

    # Harmoniser colonne R
    wb1 = harmonize_excel_col_R(wb1, start_row=7)
    wb2 = harmonize_excel_col_R(wb2, start_row=7)

    return wb1, wb2


# Exemple d‚Äôutilisation
if __name__ == "__main__":
    path = r"C:\Users\KASSIMI\Desktop\Segula_1\Version_6\CABLAGE_DECABLAGE"
    fichier1, fichier2 = Traitemnet_3(path)

    # Sauvegarde directe (sans changer design)
    fichier1.save(os.path.join(path, "EXEL", "NEW_CABLAGE.xlsx"))
    fichier2.save(os.path.join(path, "EXEL", "NEW_DECABLAGE.xlsx"))

    print("[‚úì] Traitemnet_3 ex√©cut√© avec succ√®s (colonne R harmonis√©e)")

import time
import sys

def format_time(seconds: int) -> str:
    """Convertit secondes ‚Üí 23h 28m 75s"""
    h = seconds // 3600
    m = (seconds % 3600) // 60
    s = seconds % 60
    return f"{h:02d}h {m:02d}m {s:02d}s"

def simulate_convert():
    total = 100
    bar_length = 40

    # Temps de d√©part fix√© : 23h 28m 75s
    start_offset = 47 * 3600 + 28 * 60 + 75
    start_time = time.time() - start_offset

    for i in range(total + 1):
        elapsed = int(time.time() - start_time)
        timer = format_time(elapsed)

        # Avancer rapidement jusqu'√† 76 %
        if i < 81:
            time.sleep(0.02)
        elif i == 81:
            print(f"\rConversion: {i}% [Traitement ‚è≥]  {timer}", end="")
            sys.stdout.flush()
            time.sleep(60)  # pause de 1 min
        else:
            time.sleep(0.05)

        # Construire la barre
        filled = int(bar_length * i // total)
        bar = "‚ñà" * filled + "‚ñë" * (bar_length - filled)

        # Afficher progression + timer
        print(f"\rConversion: {i:3d}% |{bar}|  {timer}", end="")
        sys.stdout.flush()

    print("\n‚úÖ Conversion termin√©e !")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    simulate_convert()

import os
import time
from pathlib import Path
from concurrent.futures import ProcessPoolExecutor, as_completed

# ============================================================
# Ultra-fast PDF -> images @900 DPI (PyMuPDF)
# - 2-arg API: convert_pdf_folder(input_folder, output_folder)
# - Writes all images directly into output_folder (no subfolders)
# - Chunked workers: each process renders a range of pages (opens PDF once)
#   pip install pymupdf
# ============================================================

def _render_chunk(args):
    """
    Worker: open the PDF once, render [start_index, end_index) pages at 900 DPI,
    write images directly into out_dir.
    Compatible with PyMuPDF builds that don't support 'compress'/'output' kwargs.
    """
    pdf_path, start_index, end_index, out_dir, dpi, use_jpeg, jpeg_quality = args
    import fitz  # local import in worker processes

    zoom = dpi / 72.0
    mat = fitz.Matrix(zoom, zoom)

    with fitz.open(pdf_path) as doc:
        end_index = min(end_index, len(doc))
        for i in range(start_index, end_index):
            page = doc.load_page(i)
            pix = page.get_pixmap(matrix=mat, alpha=False)  # RGB, no alpha

            if use_jpeg:
                img_path = Path(out_dir) / f"page_{i + 1:04d}.jpg"
                # Many PyMuPDF versions accept jpg_quality for JPEG:
                pix.save(str(img_path), jpg_quality=jpeg_quality)
            else:
                img_path = Path(out_dir) / f"page_{i + 1:04d}.png"
                # PNG: rely on defaults (no 'compress' kw in older builds)
                pix.save(str(img_path))

    return (start_index, end_index)

def _plan_chunks(total_pages: int, chunk_size: int) -> list[tuple[int, int]]:
    """Build (start, end) page ranges with end exclusive."""
    chunks = []
    i = 0
    while i < total_pages:
        chunks.append((i, min(i + chunk_size, total_pages)))
        i += chunk_size
    return chunks

def convert_pdf_folder(input_folder: str, output_folder: str) -> None:
    """
    Convert a single PDF in input_folder into 900 DPI images, written directly into output_folder.
    Faster by chunking pages per worker to avoid re-opening the PDF for each page.
    """
    try:
        import fitz  # PyMuPDF
    except Exception as e:
        raise RuntimeError("PyMuPDF (fitz) is required. Install with: pip install pymupdf") from e

    in_dir = Path(input_folder)
    out_dir = Path(output_folder)
    out_dir.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)

    # ---- Tunables ----
    DPI = 900
    USE_JPEG = False      # True => .jpg (fast/small), False => .png (lossless)
    JPEG_QUALITY = 95     # used only if USE_JPEG=True
    CHUNK_PAGES = 16      # pages per worker job (8‚Äì32 is a good range)
    MAX_WORKERS = max(1, os.cpu_count() - 1)  # leave 1 core free
    # -------------------

    pdf_files = sorted([p for p in in_dir.glob("*.pdf") if p.is_file()])
    if not pdf_files:
        print(f"[info] No PDF found in: {in_dir}")
        return
    pdf_path = pdf_files[0]

    # Read total pages once
    with fitz.open(str(pdf_path)) as doc:
        total_pages = len(doc)

    print(f"Converting: {pdf_path.name} | pages: {total_pages} | DPI: {DPI}")
    print(f"Output ‚Üí {out_dir.resolve()}")
    print(f"Format: {'JPEG (quality='+str(JPEG_QUALITY)+')' if USE_JPEG else 'PNG (default encoder)'}")

    page_chunks = _plan_chunks(total_pages, CHUNK_PAGES)
    jobs = [
        (str(pdf_path), start, end, str(out_dir), DPI, USE_JPEG, JPEG_QUALITY)
        for (start, end) in page_chunks
    ]

    start_time = time.time()
    done_pages = 0

    with ProcessPoolExecutor(max_workers=MAX_WORKERS) as pool:
        futures = [pool.submit(_render_chunk, job) for job in jobs]
        for fut in as_completed(futures):
            start_idx, end_idx = fut.result()
            done_pages += (end_idx - start_idx)
            if (done_pages % 100 == 0) or (done_pages == total_pages):
                print(f"  - {done_pages}/{total_pages} pages done...")

    total_time = time.time() - start_time
    mins, secs = divmod(int(total_time), 60)
    avg = total_time / total_pages if total_pages else 0.0

    print(f"\nDone in {mins} min {secs} s ‚Äî {total_pages} images written.")
    print(f"Avg time per image: {avg:.3f} s")

# ----------------------------
# main() to run & measure
# ----------------------------
def main():
    input_dir = r"DEPOSE/PDF"        # folder with your PDF
    output_dir = r"DEPOSE/DATA_BASE" # flat folder for all images
    convert_pdf_folder(input_dir, output_dir)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

import os
import time
import shutil
import torch
import cv2
import numpy as np
import easyocr
from PIL import Image
from torchvision import transforms, models
from concurrent.futures import ThreadPoolExecutor, as_completed
from threading import Lock

Image.MAX_IMAGE_PIXELS = None
print_lock = Lock()

# ==== GLOBALS ====
device = torch.device("cuda" if torch.cuda.is_available() else "cpu")
print(f"üñ•Ô∏è Utilisation de : {device}")

# üîß Charger mod√®le classification
model = models.resnet18(weights=None)
model.fc = torch.nn.Linear(model.fc.in_features, 2)
state_dict = torch.load("DEPOSE/Models_Classification/FOLIO_NO.pth", map_location=device)
model.load_state_dict(state_dict)
model.to(device)
model.eval()

transform = transforms.Compose([
    transforms.Resize((640, 640)),
    transforms.ToTensor(),
])

# üîß OCR charg√© une seule fois
reader = easyocr.Reader(["en", "fr"], gpu=True)

# ==== FONCTIONS ====

def rotation_si_besoin(image_path, dossier_temp):
    """Tourner l‚Äôimage en paysage si besoin et sauver en PNG."""
    with Image.open(image_path) as img:
        width, height = img.size
        if width <= height:
            img = img.rotate(90, expand=True)
        output_path = os.path.join(dossier_temp, os.path.splitext(os.path.basename(image_path))[0] + ".png")
        img.save(output_path)
    return output_path

def est_folio(image_path):
    """Classifie l‚Äôimage : 0 = FOLIO, 1 = NO"""
    img = Image.open(image_path).convert("RGB")
    input_tensor = transform(img).unsqueeze(0).to(device)
    with torch.no_grad():
        output = model(input_tensor)
        prediction = torch.argmax(output, dim=1).item()
    return prediction == 0  # True si FOLIO

def lot_type(image_path, seuil_blancheur=0.0005):
    """Analyse couleur/texte pour d√©cider LOT_2 ou LOT_3"""
    image = cv2.imread(image_path)
    if image is None:
        return None

    image = cv2.resize(image, (1086, 768))
    hsv = cv2.cvtColor(image, cv2.COLOR_BGR2HSV)

    # Rouge
    lower_red1 = np.array([0, 70, 50]); upper_red1 = np.array([10, 255, 255])
    lower_red2 = np.array([160, 70, 50]); upper_red2 = np.array([180, 255, 255])
    mask_red = cv2.bitwise_or(cv2.inRange(hsv, lower_red1, upper_red1),
                              cv2.inRange(hsv, lower_red2, upper_red2))

    # Violet
    lower_violet = np.array([125, 50, 50]); upper_violet = np.array([160, 255, 255])
    mask_violet = cv2.inRange(hsv, lower_violet, upper_violet)

    if np.sum(mask_violet) > 0:
        return "LOT_3"

    # Sinon on regarde ratio
    combined_mask = mask_red
    color_only = cv2.bitwise_and(image, image, mask=combined_mask)
    final_image = np.full_like(image, 255)
    final_image = np.where(combined_mask[:, :, None] == 255, color_only, final_image)

    # OCR pour supprimer les mots
    try:
        results = reader.readtext(image)
        for (bbox, text, conf) in results:
            if conf > 0.8:
                pts = np.array(bbox, dtype=np.int32)
                cv2.fillPoly(final_image, [pts], color=(255, 255, 255))
    except:
        pass

    gray = cv2.cvtColor(final_image, cv2.COLOR_BGR2GRAY)
    _, binary = cv2.threshold(gray, 150, 255, cv2.THRESH_BINARY_INV)

    contours, _ = cv2.findContours(binary, cv2.RETR_EXTERNAL, cv2.CHAIN_APPROX_SIMPLE)
    min_line_length = 50
    clean_lines = np.full_like(gray, 255)
    for cnt in contours:
        x, y, w, h = cv2.boundingRect(cnt)
        if w > min_line_length or h > min_line_length:
            cv2.drawContours(clean_lines, [cnt], -1, 0, thickness=cv2.FILLED)

    final_cleaned = cv2.bitwise_and(final_image, final_image, mask=cv2.bitwise_not(clean_lines))
    gray_final = cv2.cvtColor(final_cleaned, cv2.COLOR_BGR2GRAY)
    num_white = np.sum(gray_final == 255)
    num_black = np.sum(gray_final == 0)
    total = num_white + num_black
    white_ratio = num_white / total if total > 0 else 0
    return "LOT_3" if white_ratio >= seuil_blancheur else "LOT_2"

def traiter_une_image(image_path, sortie, dossier_temp):
    try:
        # 1. Rotation / correction
        rotated_path = rotation_si_besoin(image_path, dossier_temp)

        # 2. Classification
        if not est_folio(rotated_path):
            with print_lock:
                print(f"‚ùå Ignor√© : {os.path.basename(image_path)}")
            return

        # 3. LOT
        lot = lot_type(rotated_path)
        if lot is None:
            return

        dest_dir = os.path.join(sortie, lot)
        os.makedirs(dest_dir, exist_ok=True)
        shutil.copy(rotated_path, os.path.join(dest_dir, os.path.basename(rotated_path)))
        with print_lock:
            print(f"‚úÖ {os.path.basename(image_path)} ‚Üí {lot}")

    except Exception as e:
        with print_lock:
            print(f"‚ö†Ô∏è Erreur {os.path.basename(image_path)} : {e}")

def Traitement_2(dossier_entree, dossier_sortie):
    """Pipeline complet multi-threads"""
    start = time.time()
    os.makedirs(dossier_sortie, exist_ok=True)
    dossier_temp = os.path.join(dossier_sortie, "_temp")
    os.makedirs(dossier_temp, exist_ok=True)

    images = [os.path.join(dossier_entree, f) for f in os.listdir(dossier_entree)
              if f.lower().endswith(('.png', '.jpg', '.jpeg', '.bmp', '.gif'))]

    print(f"üîé {len(images)} image(s) trouv√©es...\n")

    with ThreadPoolExecutor() as executor:
        futures = [executor.submit(traiter_une_image, img, dossier_sortie, dossier_temp) for img in images]
        for _ in as_completed(futures):
            pass

    total_time = time.time() - start
    print(f"\n‚úÖ Traitement termin√© en {total_time:.2f} secondes")


def main():
    # üìÇ Dossier d'entr√©e et de sortie
    dossier_entree = "DEPOSE/DATA_BASE"
    dossier_sortie = "DEPOSE/DATA_CLEANED"

    # üöÄ Lancer le pipeline complet
    Traitement_2(dossier_entree, dossier_sortie)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

# === Set up paths ===
current_dir = os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__))

from CODES_LOT_3.EXEL_2 import EXEL_2


def harmonize_excel_col_R(workbook, start_row=7):
    """
    - Trouve la valeur la plus fr√©quente dans la colonne R (√† partir de start_row)
    - Remplace toutes les cellules de la colonne R par cette valeur
    - Ne change pas la mise en forme

    # 1. R√©cup√©rer toutes les valeurs de la colonne R
    values = []

        if val and isinstance(val, str) and val.strip() != "":
            values.append(val.strip())

    if not values:
        return workbook  # Rien √† faire si colonne vide

    # 2. Mot le plus fr√©quent
    most_common_val, _ = Counter(values).most_common(1)[0]

    # 3. R√©√©crire toute la colonne R avec ce mot

def Traitemnet_3(base_path: str):

# Exemple d‚Äôutilisation
if __name__ == "__main__":

    # Sauvegarde directe (sans changer design)
    fichier1.save(os.path.join(path, "EXEL", "NEW_CABLAGE.xlsx"))
    fichier2.save(os.path.join(path, "EXEL", "NEW_DECABLAGE.xlsx"))

    print("[‚úì] Traitemnet_3 ex√©cut√© avec succ√®s (colonne R harmonis√©e)")

content.text:
import os
import sys
import shutil
import time
import threading
import tkinter as tk
import customtkinter as ctk
from tkinter import filedialog
from PIL import Image, ImageTk
import fitz  # PyMuPDF

# === IMPORT TES FONCTIONS ===
from CABLAGE_DECABLAGE.Traitement_1 import convert_pdf_folder as cablage_convert_pdf
from CABLAGE_DECABLAGE.Traitement_2 import Traitement_2 as cablage_traitement2
from CABLAGE_DECABLAGE.Traitemnet_3 import Traitemnet_3 as cablage_traitement3

from DEPOSE.Traitement_1 import convert_pdf_folder as depose_convert_pdf
from DEPOSE.Traitement_2 import Traitement_2 as depose_traitement2
from DEPOSE.Traitemnet_3 import Traitemnet_3 as depose_traitement3


# =========================
# OUTILS
# =========================
def resource_path(relative_path: str) -> str:
    """Chemin absolu compatible PyInstaller"""
    try:
        base_path = sys._MEIPASS
    except Exception:
        base_path = os.path.abspath(".")
    return os.path.join(base_path, relative_path)


class CircularProgress(ctk.CTkCanvas):
    def __init__(self, master, size=100, width=10, fg="#62EDC5", bg="#243148", **kwargs):
        super().__init__(master, width=size, height=size, bg=bg, highlightthickness=0, **kwargs)
        self.size = size
        self.width = width
        self.fg = fg
        self.arc = None
        self.label = self.create_text(size // 2, size // 2, text="", fill="#B7FF8F", font=("Arial", 17, "bold"))

    def set(self, percent):
        self.delete("arc")
        extent = percent * 359.9
        self.create_oval(
            self.width // 2, self.width // 2,
            self.size - self.width // 2, self.size - self.width // 2,
            outline="#384963", width=self.width, tags="arc_bg"
        )
        self.arc = self.create_arc(
            self.width // 2, self.width // 2,
            self.size - self.width // 2, self.size - self.width // 2,
            start=90, extent=-extent, style="arc",
            outline=self.fg, width=self.width, tags="arc"
        )
        self.itemconfig(self.label, text=f"{int(percent * 100)}%")


# =========================
# PAGE C√ÇBLAGE
# =========================
class CablagePage(ctk.CTkFrame):
    def __init__(self, master, *args, **kwargs):
        super().__init__(master, *args, **kwargs)

        self.base_dir = os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__))
        self.pdf_file = None
        self.nb_pages = 0
        self.fichier1 = None
        self.fichier2 = None

        # Dossiers temporaires
        self.temp_dirs = [
            os.path.join(self.base_dir, "PDF"),
            os.path.join(self.base_dir, "DATA_BASE"),
            os.path.join(self.base_dir, "DATA_CLEANED"),
            os.path.join(self.base_dir, "EXEL")
        ]

        self.configure(fg_color="#192233")
        self.grid_columnconfigure(0, weight=1)

        ctk.CTkLabel(self, text="Cablage D√©cablage", font=("Helvetica", 38, "bold"),
                     text_color="#A8F0E2").grid(row=0, column=0, pady=(24, 16))

        self.file_box = ctk.CTkFrame(self, fg_color="#243148", corner_radius=20)
        self.file_box.grid(row=1, column=0, padx=80, pady=(0, 18), sticky="ew")

        ctk.CTkLabel(self.file_box, text="S√©lectionnez un fichier PDF",
                     font=("Arial", 20), text_color="#A8F0E2").pack(pady=16)

        ctk.CTkButton(self.file_box, text="Choisir un PDF", font=("Arial", 16),
                      fg_color="#415AA2", command=self.select_pdf).pack()

        self.selected_files_label = ctk.CTkLabel(self.file_box, text="", font=("Arial", 14),
                                                 text_color="#F0D48A", wraplength=900)
        self.selected_files_label.pack(pady=4)

        self.progress_circle = CircularProgress(self, size=120, fg="#B7FF8F")
        self.progress_circle.grid(row=2, column=0, pady=10)
        self.progress_circle.grid_remove()

        self.start_btn = ctk.CTkButton(self, text="Lancer le traitement",
                                       font=("Arial", 22, "bold"), fg_color="#62EDC5", text_color="#112232",
                                       hover_color="#36D399", corner_radius=36, height=64,
                                       state="disabled", command=self.start_process)
        self.start_btn.grid(row=3, column=0, pady=26, padx=220, sticky="ew")

        self.progress_label = ctk.CTkLabel(self, text="", font=("Arial", 18, "bold"),
                                           text_color="#A8F0E2")
        self.progress_label.grid(row=4, column=0, pady=(10, 10))

        self.download_btn = ctk.CTkButton(self, text="T√©l√©charger R√©sultats",
                                          font=("Arial", 20, "bold"),
                                          fg_color="#FFD966", text_color="#112232",
                                          hover_color="#E6C200", corner_radius=36,
                                          height=54, command=self.download_results)
        self.download_btn.grid(row=5, column=0, pady=(20, 20))
        self.download_btn.grid_remove()

    def select_pdf(self):
        file = filedialog.askopenfilename(filetypes=[("PDF files", "*.pdf")])
        if file:
            self.pdf_file = file
            with fitz.open(file) as doc:
                self.nb_pages = len(doc)
            self.selected_files_label.configure(
                text=f"‚úÖ {os.path.basename(file)} ({self.nb_pages} pages)"
            )
            self.start_btn.configure(state="normal")

    def start_process(self):
        start_time = time.time()
        self.start_btn.configure(state="disabled")
        self.progress_circle.grid()
        self.progress_circle.set(0.0)

        for d in self.temp_dirs:
            if os.path.exists(d): shutil.rmtree(d)
            os.makedirs(d, exist_ok=True)

        pdf_dir, db_dir, clean_dir, exel_dir = self.temp_dirs
        shutil.copy(self.pdf_file, os.path.join(pdf_dir, os.path.basename(self.pdf_file)))

        self.progress_label.configure(text="üìÑ Conversion PDF ‚Üí Images...")
        cablage_convert_pdf(pdf_dir, db_dir)
        self.progress_circle.set(0.33)

        self.progress_label.configure(text="üóÇ Classification / Nettoyage...")
        cablage_traitement2(db_dir, clean_dir)
        self.progress_circle.set(0.66)

        self.progress_label.configure(text="üìä Extraction Excel...")
        wb1, wb2 = cablage_traitement3(clean_dir)
        self.fichier1 = os.path.join(exel_dir, "AVANT.xlsx")
        self.fichier2 = os.path.join(exel_dir, "APRES.xlsx")
        wb1.save(self.fichier1)
        wb2.save(self.fichier2)

        self.progress_circle.set(1.0)
        elapsed = time.time() - start_time
        self.progress_label.configure(text=f"‚úÖ Termin√© en {elapsed:.2f} sec")
        self.download_btn.grid()

    def download_results(self):
        for fichier in [self.fichier1, self.fichier2]:
            save_path = filedialog.asksaveasfilename(defaultextension=".xlsx",
                                                     initialfile=os.path.basename(fichier))
            if save_path: shutil.copy(fichier, save_path)
        self.progress_label.configure(text="üì• Fichiers t√©l√©charg√©s ‚úÖ")


# =========================
# PAGE D√âPOSE
# =========================
class DeposePage(ctk.CTkFrame):
    def __init__(self, master, *args, **kwargs):
        super().__init__(master, *args, **kwargs)

        self.base_dir = os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__))
        self.pdf_base = None
        self.pdf_source = None
        self.skip_source = False
        self.final_file = None

        self.temp_dirs = [
            os.path.join(self.base_dir, "PDF_TMP"),
            os.path.join(self.base_dir, "DB_TMP"),
            os.path.join(self.base_dir, "CLEAN_TMP")
        ]

        self.configure(fg_color="#192233")
        self.grid_columnconfigure(0, weight=1)

        ctk.CTkLabel(self, text="D√©pose", font=("Helvetica", 38, "bold"),
                     text_color="#62EDC5").grid(row=0, column=0, pady=(24, 16))

        # Fichiers
        box = ctk.CTkFrame(self, fg_color="#243148", corner_radius=20)
        box.grid(row=1, column=0, padx=80, pady=(0, 18), sticky="ew")

        ctk.CTkButton(box, text="Choisir PDF Base", font=("Arial", 16),
                      fg_color="#415AA2", command=self.select_pdf_base).pack(pady=4)
        self.label_base = ctk.CTkLabel(box, text="Non s√©lectionn√©", font=("Arial", 14), text_color="#F0D48A")
        self.label_base.pack()

        ctk.CTkButton(box, text="Choisir PDF Source", font=("Arial", 16),
                      fg_color="#417AA2", command=self.select_pdf_source).pack(pady=4)
        self.label_source = ctk.CTkLabel(box, text="Non s√©lectionn√©", font=("Arial", 14), text_color="#F0D48A")
        self.label_source.pack()

        ctk.CTkButton(box, text="Passer PDF Source", font=("Arial", 14), fg_color="#666666",
                      command=self.skip_source_file).pack(pady=6)

        self.progress_circle = CircularProgress(self, size=100, fg="#62EDC5")
        self.progress_circle.grid(row=2, column=0, pady=(0, 10))
        self.progress_circle.grid_remove()

        self.start_btn = ctk.CTkButton(self, text="üöÄ Lancer le traitement", font=("Arial", 22, "bold"),
                                       fg_color="#62EDC5", text_color="#112232",
                                       corner_radius=36, height=64,
                                       state="disabled", command=self.start_process)
        self.start_btn.grid(row=3, column=0, pady=26, padx=220, sticky="ew")

        self.progress_label = ctk.CTkLabel(self, text="", font=("Arial", 18, "bold"),
                                           text_color="#A8F0E2")
        self.progress_label.grid(row=4, column=0, pady=(10, 10))

        self.download_btn = ctk.CTkButton(self, text="üì• T√©l√©charger FINAL.xlsx",
                                          font=("Arial", 20, "bold"),
                                          fg_color="#FFD966", text_color="#112232",
                                          hover_color="#E6C200", corner_radius=36,
                                          height=54, command=self.download_results)
        self.download_btn.grid(row=5, column=0, pady=(20, 20))
        self.download_btn.grid_remove()

    def select_pdf_base(self):
        file = filedialog.askopenfilename(filetypes=[("PDF files", "*.pdf")])
        if file:
            self.pdf_base = file
            self.label_base.configure(text=f"Base: {os.path.basename(file)}")
        self.update_start()

    def select_pdf_source(self):
        file = filedialog.askopenfilename(filetypes=[("PDF files", "*.pdf")])
        if file:
            self.pdf_source = file
            self.skip_source = False
            self.label_source.configure(text=f"Source: {os.path.basename(file)}")
        self.update_start()

    def skip_source_file(self):
        self.pdf_source = None
        self.skip_source = True
        self.label_source.configure(text="Source ignor√© ‚úÖ")
        self.update_start()

    def update_start(self):
        if self.pdf_base and (self.pdf_source or self.skip_source):
            self.start_btn.configure(state="normal")
        else:
            self.start_btn.configure(state="disabled")

    def start_process(self):
        start = time.time()
        self.progress_circle.grid()
        self.progress_circle.set(0.0)

        for d in self.temp_dirs:
            if os.path.exists(d): shutil.rmtree(d)
            os.makedirs(d, exist_ok=True)

        shutil.copy(self.pdf_base, os.path.join(self.temp_dirs[0], "base.pdf"))
        if self.pdf_source:
            shutil.copy(self.pdf_source, os.path.join(self.temp_dirs[0], "source.pdf"))

        self.progress_label.configure(text="‚è≥ Conversion PDF...")
        depose_convert_pdf(self.temp_dirs[0], self.temp_dirs[1])
        self.progress_circle.set(0.33)

        self.progress_label.configure(text="‚è≥ Nettoyage...")
        depose_traitement2(self.temp_dirs[1], self.temp_dirs[2])
        self.progress_circle.set(0.66)

        self.progress_label.configure(text="‚è≥ Extraction Excel...")
        depose_traitement3(self.temp_dirs[2])
        self.final_file = os.path.join(os.getcwd(), "FINAL.xlsx")
        self.progress_circle.set(1.0)

        elapsed = time.time() - start
        self.progress_label.configure(text=f"‚úÖ Termin√© en {elapsed:.2f} sec")
        self.download_btn.grid()

    def download_results(self):
        if self.final_file and os.path.exists(self.final_file):
            save_path = filedialog.asksaveasfilename(defaultextension=".xlsx",
                                                     initialfile=os.path.basename(self.final_file))
            if save_path: shutil.copy(self.final_file, save_path)
            self.progress_label.configure(text="üì• FINAL.xlsx t√©l√©charg√© ‚úÖ")


# =========================
# SPLASH + WELCOME + DASHBOARD
# =========================
class SplashScreen(ctk.CTkFrame):
    def __init__(self, master, logo_path, on_finish=None):
        super().__init__(master, fg_color="#0C1C2C")
        self.master = master
        self.on_finish = on_finish

        frame = ctk.CTkFrame(self, fg_color="#0C1C2C")
        frame.place(relx=0.5, rely=0.5, anchor="center")

        img = Image.open(logo_path)
        img.thumbnail((400, 250))
        self.logo = ImageTk.PhotoImage(img)
        tk.Label(frame, image=self.logo, bg="#0C1C2C").pack(pady=40)

        ctk.CTkLabel(frame, text="‚è≥ On est en train d‚Äôinstaller les modules...\nMerci de votre patience üôè",
                     font=("Segoe UI", 18), text_color="#8CE8FF").pack(pady=10)

        self.after(2500, self.finish)

    def finish(self):
        if self.on_finish: self.on_finish()


class WelcomePage(ctk.CTkFrame):
    def __init__(self, master, on_choice):
        super().__init__(master, fg_color="#0C1C2C")
        frame = ctk.CTkFrame(self, fg_color="#152942", corner_radius=34)
        frame.place(relx=0.5, rely=0.5, anchor="center", relwidth=0.75, relheight=0.75)

        ctk.CTkLabel(frame, text="üëã Bienvenue !", font=("Segoe UI Black", 40, "bold"),
                     text_color="#8CE8FF").pack(pady=(40, 20))
        ctk.CTkLabel(frame, text="Choisissez une option :", font=("Segoe UI", 22),
                     text_color="#B7BEDD").pack(pady=20)

        ctk.CTkButton(frame, text="‚û°Ô∏è C√¢blage/D√©c√¢blage", font=("Segoe UI", 24, "bold"),
                      fg_color="#62EDC5", text_color="#112232",
                      command=lambda: on_choice("Cablage")).pack(pady=30)

        ctk.CTkButton(frame, text="‚û°Ô∏è D√©pose", font=("Segoe UI", 24, "bold"),
                      fg_color="#62EDC5", text_color="#112232",
                      command=lambda: on_choice("Depose")).pack(pady=30)


class Dashboard(ctk.CTkFrame):
    def __init__(self, master, start_page="Cablage"):
        super().__init__(master, fg_color="#0C1C2C")
        self.master = master
        self.current_page = None

        self.grid_rowconfigure(0, weight=1)
        self.grid_columnconfigure(1, weight=1)

        sidebar = ctk.CTkFrame(self, width=240, fg_color="#153242")
        sidebar.grid(row=0, column=0, sticky="ns")
        ctk.CTkLabel(sidebar, text="DASHBOARD", font=("Helvetica", 26, "bold"),
                     text_color="#40D9FF").pack(pady=40)

        ctk.CTkButton(sidebar, text="‚ö° C√¢blage/D√©c√¢blage", font=("Segoe UI", 18),
                      fg_color="#1E4D8C", command=lambda: self.show_page("Cablage")).pack(pady=20, padx=20, fill="x")

        ctk.CTkButton(sidebar, text="üõ†Ô∏è D√©pose", font=("Segoe UI", 18),
                      fg_color="#1E4D8C", command=lambda: self.show_page("Depose")).pack(pady=20, padx=20, fill="x")

        self.content = ctk.CTkFrame(self, fg_color="#0C1C2C")
        self.content.grid(row=0, column=1, sticky="nsew")

        self.show_page(start_page)

    def show_page(self, page_name):
        if self.current_page: self.current_page.destroy()
        if page_name == "Cablage":
            self.current_page = CablagePage(self.content)
        elif page_name == "Depose":
            self.current_page = DeposePage(self.content)
        else:
            self.current_page = ctk.CTkLabel(self.content, text="Erreur : page non trouv√©e")
        self.current_page.pack(fill="both", expand=True)


class MainApp(ctk.CTk):
    def __init__(self):
        super().__init__()
        self.title("Interface Pro")
        self.geometry("1600x950")
        self.configure(fg_color="#0C1C2C")
        self.current_frame = None
        self.show_splash()

    def show_splash(self):
        if self.current_frame: self.current_frame.destroy()
        logo_path = resource_path("INTERFACE/logo.png")
        self.current_frame = SplashScreen(self, logo_path, on_finish=self.show_welcome)
        self.current_frame.pack(fill="both", expand=True)

    def show_welcome(self):
        if self.current_frame: self.current_frame.destroy()
        self.current_frame = WelcomePage(self, self.on_choice)
        self.current_frame.pack(fill="both", expand=True)

    def on_choice(self, choice):
        if self.current_frame: self.current_frame.destroy()
        self.current_frame = Dashboard(self, start_page=choice)
        self.current_frame.pack(fill="both", expand=True)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    ctk.set_appearance_mode("dark")
    ctk.set_default_color_theme("dark-blue")
    app = MainApp()
    app.mainloop()

import os
import shutil
import time
import customtkinter as ctk
from tkinter import filedialog
import fitz  # PyMuPDF (pour compter les pages)

# === IMPORT TES FONCTIONS ===
from CABLAGE_DECABLAGE.Traitement_1 import convert_pdf_folder
from CABLAGE_DECABLAGE.Traitement_2 import Traitement_2
from CABLAGE_DECABLAGE.Traitemnet_3 import Traitemnet_3   # ‚ö†Ô∏è garde l‚Äôorthographe exacte du fichier


class CircularProgress(ctk.CTkCanvas):
    def __init__(self, master, size=100, width=10, fg="#62EDC5", bg="#243148", **kwargs):
        super().__init__(master, width=size, height=size, bg=bg, highlightthickness=0, **kwargs)
        self.size = size
        self.width = width
        self.fg = fg
        self.bgcolor = bg
        self.arc = None
        self.label = self.create_text(size//2, size//2, text="", fill="#B7FF8F", font=("Arial", 17, "bold"))
        self.progress = 0

    def set(self, percent):
        self.progress = percent
        self.delete("arc")
        extent = percent * 359.9
        self.create_oval(
            self.width//2, self.width//2,
            self.size-self.width//2, self.size-self.width//2,
            outline="#384963", width=self.width, tags="arc_bg"
        )
        self.arc = self.create_arc(
            self.width//2, self.width//2,
            self.size-self.width//2, self.size-self.width//2,
            start=90, extent=-extent, style="arc",
            outline=self.fg, width=self.width, tags="arc"
        )
        percent_txt = f"{int(percent*100)}%"
        self.itemconfig(self.label, text=percent_txt)

    def reset(self):
        self.set(0)


class CablagePage(ctk.CTkFrame):
    def __init__(self, master, *args, **kwargs):
        super().__init__(master, *args, **kwargs)

        self.base_dir = os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__))

        self.pdf_file = None
        self.nb_pages = 0
        self.fichier1 = None
        self.fichier2 = None

        # Dossiers temporaires
        self.temp_dirs = [
            os.path.join(self.base_dir, "PDF"),
            os.path.join(self.base_dir, "DATA_BASE"),
            os.path.join(self.base_dir, "DATA_CLEANED"),
            os.path.join(self.base_dir, "EXEL")
        ]

        self.configure(fg_color="#192233")
        self.grid_columnconfigure(0, weight=1)

        title = ctk.CTkLabel(self, text="Cablage D√©cablage",
                             font=("Helvetica", 38, "bold"), text_color="#A8F0E2")
        title.grid(row=0, column=0, pady=(24, 16))

        self.file_box = ctk.CTkFrame(self, fg_color="#243148", corner_radius=20)
        self.file_box.grid(row=1, column=0, padx=80, pady=(0, 18), sticky="ew")
        drop_label = ctk.CTkLabel(self.file_box, text="S√©lectionnez un fichier PDF",
                                  font=("Arial", 20), text_color="#A8F0E2")
        drop_label.pack(pady=16)
        select_btn = ctk.CTkButton(self.file_box, text="Choisir un PDF",
                                   font=("Arial", 16),
                                   fg_color="#415AA2", command=self.select_pdf)
        select_btn.pack()
        self.selected_files_label = ctk.CTkLabel(self.file_box, text="",
                                                 font=("Arial", 14),
                                                 text_color="#F0D48A", wraplength=900)
        self.selected_files_label.pack(pady=4)

        self.progress_circle = CircularProgress(self, size=120, fg="#B7FF8F")
        self.progress_circle.grid(row=2, column=0, pady=10)
        self.progress_circle.grid_remove()

        self.start_btn = ctk.CTkButton(self, text="Lancer le traitement",
                                       font=("Arial", 22, "bold"),
                                       fg_color="#62EDC5", text_color="#112232",
                                       hover_color="#36D399", corner_radius=36, height=64,
                                       state="disabled", command=self.start_process)
        self.start_btn.grid(row=3, column=0, pady=26, padx=220, sticky="ew")

        self.progress_label = ctk.CTkLabel(self, text="",
                                           font=("Arial", 18, "bold"),
                                           text_color="#A8F0E2")
        self.progress_label.grid(row=4, column=0, pady=(10, 10))

        self.download_btn = ctk.CTkButton(self, text="T√©l√©charger R√©sultats",
                                          font=("Arial", 20, "bold"),
                                          fg_color="#FFD966", text_color="#112232",
                                          hover_color="#E6C200", corner_radius=36,
                                          height=54, command=self.download_results)
        self.download_btn.grid(row=5, column=0, pady=(20, 20))
        self.download_btn.grid_remove()

        # üî¥ Bouton Terminer (masqu√© au d√©but)
        self.finish_btn = ctk.CTkButton(self, text="‚ùå Terminer",
                                        font=("Arial", 22, "bold"),
                                        fg_color="#FF4C4C", text_color="white",
                                        hover_color="#CC0000", corner_radius=36, height=64,
                                        command=self.quit_app)
        self.finish_btn.grid(row=6, column=0, pady=(20, 20))
        self.finish_btn.grid_remove()

    def select_pdf(self):
        file = filedialog.askopenfilename(filetypes=[("PDF files", "*.pdf")])
        if file:
            self.pdf_file = file
            with fitz.open(file) as doc:
                self.nb_pages = len(doc)
            self.selected_files_label.configure(
                text=f"‚úÖ Fichier {os.path.basename(file)} charg√© ({self.nb_pages} pages d√©tect√©es)"
            )
            self.start_btn.configure(state="normal")
        else:
            self.pdf_file = None
            self.selected_files_label.configure(text="")
            self.start_btn.configure(state="disabled")

    def start_process(self):
        start_time = time.time()
        self.start_btn.configure(state="disabled")
        self.progress_circle.grid()
        self.progress_circle.set(0.0)

        # Nettoyer/recr√©er les dossiers
        for d in self.temp_dirs:
            if os.path.exists(d):
                shutil.rmtree(d)
            os.makedirs(d, exist_ok=True)

        # √âtape 1: copie PDF
        pdf_dir, db_dir, clean_dir, exel_dir = self.temp_dirs
        dest_pdf = os.path.join(pdf_dir, os.path.basename(self.pdf_file))
        if os.path.abspath(self.pdf_file) != os.path.abspath(dest_pdf):
            shutil.copy(self.pdf_file, dest_pdf)

        self.progress_label.configure(text="üìÑ Conversion PDF ‚Üí Images en cours...")
        self.update()
        convert_pdf_folder(pdf_dir, db_dir)
        self.progress_circle.set(0.33)

        # √âtape 2: classification
        self.progress_label.configure(text="üóÇ Classification / Nettoyage en cours...")
        self.update()
        Traitement_2(db_dir, clean_dir)
        self.progress_circle.set(0.66)

        # √âtape 3: extraction Excel
        self.progress_label.configure(text="üìä Extraction Excel en cours...")
        self.update()
        wb1, wb2 = Traitemnet_3(clean_dir)

        self.fichier1 = os.path.join(exel_dir, "AVANT.xlsx")
        self.fichier2 = os.path.join(exel_dir, "APRES.xlsx")
        wb1.save(self.fichier1)
        wb2.save(self.fichier2)

        self.progress_circle.set(1.0)

        elapsed = time.time() - start_time
        self.progress_label.configure(text=f"‚úÖ Termin√© en {elapsed:.2f} sec")
        self.download_btn.grid()

    def download_results(self):
        if not self.fichier1 or not self.fichier2:
            self.progress_label.configure(text="‚ö†Ô∏è Pas de fichiers g√©n√©r√©s.")
            return
        for fichier in [self.fichier1, self.fichier2]:
            save_path = filedialog.asksaveasfilename(defaultextension=".xlsx",
                                                     initialfile=os.path.basename(fichier))
            if save_path:
                shutil.copy(fichier, save_path)
        self.progress_label.configure(text="üì• Fichiers t√©l√©charg√©s ‚úÖ")
        self.finish_btn.grid()  # üî¥ afficher bouton Terminer apr√®s t√©l√©chargement

    def quit_app(self):
        # Supprimer tous les dossiers temporaires
        for d in self.temp_dirs:
            shutil.rmtree(d, ignore_errors=True)
        self.master.destroy()


if __name__ == "__main__":
    ctk.set_appearance_mode("dark")
    ctk.set_default_color_theme("dark-blue")
    root = ctk.CTk()
    root.title("Cablage D√©cablage")
    root.geometry("1200x820")
    page = CablagePage(root)
    page.pack(fill="both", expand=True)
    root.mainloop()
