import os
import sys
import shutil
import time
import threading
import tkinter as tk
import customtkinter as ctk
from tkinter import filedialog
from PIL import Image, ImageTk
import fitz  # PyMuPDF

# === IMPORT TES FONCTIONS ===
from CABLAGE_DECABLAGE.Traitement_1 import convert_pdf_folder as cablage_convert_pdf
from CABLAGE_DECABLAGE.Traitement_2 import Traitement_2 as cablage_traitement2
from CABLAGE_DECABLAGE.Traitemnet_3 import Traitemnet_3 as cablage_traitement3

from DEPOSE.Traitement_1 import convert_pdf_folder as depose_convert_pdf
from DEPOSE.Traitement_2 import Traitement_2 as depose_traitement2
from DEPOSE.Traitemnet_3 import Traitemnet_3 as depose_traitement3


# =========================
# OUTILS
# =========================
def resource_path(relative_path: str) -> str:
    """Chemin absolu compatible PyInstaller"""
    try:
        base_path = sys._MEIPASS
    except Exception:
        base_path = os.path.abspath(".")
    return os.path.join(base_path, relative_path)


class CircularProgress(ctk.CTkCanvas):
    def __init__(self, master, size=100, width=10, fg="#62EDC5", bg="#243148", **kwargs):
        super().__init__(master, width=size, height=size, bg=bg, highlightthickness=0, **kwargs)
        self.size = size
        self.width = width
        self.fg = fg
        self.arc = None
        self.label = self.create_text(size // 2, size // 2, text="", fill="#B7FF8F", font=("Arial", 17, "bold"))

    def set(self, percent):
        self.delete("arc")
        extent = percent * 359.9
        self.create_oval(
            self.width // 2, self.width // 2,
            self.size - self.width // 2, self.size - self.width // 2,
            outline="#384963", width=self.width, tags="arc_bg"
        )
        self.arc = self.create_arc(
            self.width // 2, self.width // 2,
            self.size - self.width // 2, self.size - self.width // 2,
            start=90, extent=-extent, style="arc",
            outline=self.fg, width=self.width, tags="arc"
        )
        self.itemconfig(self.label, text=f"{int(percent * 100)}%")


# =========================
# PAGE C√ÇBLAGE
# =========================
class CablagePage(ctk.CTkFrame):
    def __init__(self, master, *args, **kwargs):
        super().__init__(master, *args, **kwargs)

        self.base_dir = os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__))
        self.pdf_file = None
        self.nb_pages = 0
        self.fichier1 = None
        self.fichier2 = None

        # Dossiers temporaires
        self.temp_dirs = [
            os.path.join(self.base_dir, "PDF"),
            os.path.join(self.base_dir, "DATA_BASE"),
            os.path.join(self.base_dir, "DATA_CLEANED"),
            os.path.join(self.base_dir, "EXEL")
        ]

        self.configure(fg_color="#192233")
        self.grid_columnconfigure(0, weight=1)

        ctk.CTkLabel(self, text="Cablage D√©cablage", font=("Helvetica", 38, "bold"),
                     text_color="#A8F0E2").grid(row=0, column=0, pady=(24, 16))

        self.file_box = ctk.CTkFrame(self, fg_color="#243148", corner_radius=20)
        self.file_box.grid(row=1, column=0, padx=80, pady=(0, 18), sticky="ew")

        ctk.CTkLabel(self.file_box, text="S√©lectionnez un fichier PDF",
                     font=("Arial", 20), text_color="#A8F0E2").pack(pady=16)

        ctk.CTkButton(self.file_box, text="Choisir un PDF", font=("Arial", 16),
                      fg_color="#415AA2", command=self.select_pdf).pack()

        self.selected_files_label = ctk.CTkLabel(self.file_box, text="", font=("Arial", 14),
                                                 text_color="#F0D48A", wraplength=900)
        self.selected_files_label.pack(pady=4)

        self.progress_circle = CircularProgress(self, size=120, fg="#B7FF8F")
        self.progress_circle.grid(row=2, column=0, pady=10)
        self.progress_circle.grid_remove()

        self.start_btn = ctk.CTkButton(self, text="Lancer le traitement",
                                       font=("Arial", 22, "bold"), fg_color="#62EDC5", text_color="#112232",
                                       hover_color="#36D399", corner_radius=36, height=64,
                                       state="disabled", command=self.start_process)
        self.start_btn.grid(row=3, column=0, pady=26, padx=220, sticky="ew")

        self.progress_label = ctk.CTkLabel(self, text="", font=("Arial", 18, "bold"),
                                           text_color="#A8F0E2")
        self.progress_label.grid(row=4, column=0, pady=(10, 10))

        self.download_btn = ctk.CTkButton(self, text="T√©l√©charger R√©sultats",
                                          font=("Arial", 20, "bold"),
                                          fg_color="#FFD966", text_color="#112232",
                                          hover_color="#E6C200", corner_radius=36,
                                          height=54, command=self.download_results)
        self.download_btn.grid(row=5, column=0, pady=(20, 20))
        self.download_btn.grid_remove()

    def select_pdf(self):
        file = filedialog.askopenfilename(filetypes=[("PDF files", "*.pdf")])
        if file:
            self.pdf_file = file
            with fitz.open(file) as doc:
                self.nb_pages = len(doc)
            self.selected_files_label.configure(
                text=f"‚úÖ {os.path.basename(file)} ({self.nb_pages} pages)"
            )
            self.start_btn.configure(state="normal")

    def start_process(self):
        start_time = time.time()
        self.start_btn.configure(state="disabled")
        self.progress_circle.grid()
        self.progress_circle.set(0.0)

        for d in self.temp_dirs:
            if os.path.exists(d): shutil.rmtree(d)
            os.makedirs(d, exist_ok=True)

        pdf_dir, db_dir, clean_dir, exel_dir = self.temp_dirs
        shutil.copy(self.pdf_file, os.path.join(pdf_dir, os.path.basename(self.pdf_file)))

        self.progress_label.configure(text="üìÑ Conversion PDF ‚Üí Images...")
        cablage_convert_pdf(pdf_dir, db_dir)
        self.progress_circle.set(0.33)

        self.progress_label.configure(text="üóÇ Classification / Nettoyage...")
        cablage_traitement2(db_dir, clean_dir)
        self.progress_circle.set(0.66)

        self.progress_label.configure(text="üìä Extraction Excel...")
        wb1, wb2 = cablage_traitement3(clean_dir)
        self.fichier1 = os.path.join(exel_dir, "AVANT.xlsx")
        self.fichier2 = os.path.join(exel_dir, "APRES.xlsx")
        wb1.save(self.fichier1)
        wb2.save(self.fichier2)

        self.progress_circle.set(1.0)
        elapsed = time.time() - start_time
        self.progress_label.configure(text=f"‚úÖ Termin√© en {elapsed:.2f} sec")
        self.download_btn.grid()

    def download_results(self):
        for fichier in [self.fichier1, self.fichier2]:
            save_path = filedialog.asksaveasfilename(defaultextension=".xlsx",
                                                     initialfile=os.path.basename(fichier))
            if save_path: shutil.copy(fichier, save_path)
        self.progress_label.configure(text="üì• Fichiers t√©l√©charg√©s ‚úÖ")


# =========================
# PAGE D√âPOSE
# =========================
class DeposePage(ctk.CTkFrame):
    def __init__(self, master, *args, **kwargs):
        super().__init__(master, *args, **kwargs)

        self.base_dir = os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__))
        self.pdf_base = None
        self.pdf_source = None
        self.skip_source = False
        self.final_file = None

        self.temp_dirs = [
            os.path.join(self.base_dir, "PDF_TMP"),
            os.path.join(self.base_dir, "DB_TMP"),
            os.path.join(self.base_dir, "CLEAN_TMP")
        ]

        self.configure(fg_color="#192233")
        self.grid_columnconfigure(0, weight=1)

        ctk.CTkLabel(self, text="D√©pose", font=("Helvetica", 38, "bold"),
                     text_color="#62EDC5").grid(row=0, column=0, pady=(24, 16))

        # Fichiers
        box = ctk.CTkFrame(self, fg_color="#243148", corner_radius=20)
        box.grid(row=1, column=0, padx=80, pady=(0, 18), sticky="ew")

        ctk.CTkButton(box, text="Choisir PDF Base", font=("Arial", 16),
                      fg_color="#415AA2", command=self.select_pdf_base).pack(pady=4)
        self.label_base = ctk.CTkLabel(box, text="Non s√©lectionn√©", font=("Arial", 14), text_color="#F0D48A")
        self.label_base.pack()

        ctk.CTkButton(box, text="Choisir PDF Source", font=("Arial", 16),
                      fg_color="#417AA2", command=self.select_pdf_source).pack(pady=4)
        self.label_source = ctk.CTkLabel(box, text="Non s√©lectionn√©", font=("Arial", 14), text_color="#F0D48A")
        self.label_source.pack()

        ctk.CTkButton(box, text="Passer PDF Source", font=("Arial", 14), fg_color="#666666",
                      command=self.skip_source_file).pack(pady=6)

        self.progress_circle = CircularProgress(self, size=100, fg="#62EDC5")
        self.progress_circle.grid(row=2, column=0, pady=(0, 10))
        self.progress_circle.grid_remove()

        self.start_btn = ctk.CTkButton(self, text="üöÄ Lancer le traitement", font=("Arial", 22, "bold"),
                                       fg_color="#62EDC5", text_color="#112232",
                                       corner_radius=36, height=64,
                                       state="disabled", command=self.start_process)
        self.start_btn.grid(row=3, column=0, pady=26, padx=220, sticky="ew")

        self.progress_label = ctk.CTkLabel(self, text="", font=("Arial", 18, "bold"),
                                           text_color="#A8F0E2")
        self.progress_label.grid(row=4, column=0, pady=(10, 10))

        self.download_btn = ctk.CTkButton(self, text="üì• T√©l√©charger FINAL.xlsx",
                                          font=("Arial", 20, "bold"),
                                          fg_color="#FFD966", text_color="#112232",
                                          hover_color="#E6C200", corner_radius=36,
                                          height=54, command=self.download_results)
        self.download_btn.grid(row=5, column=0, pady=(20, 20))
        self.download_btn.grid_remove()

    def select_pdf_base(self):
        file = filedialog.askopenfilename(filetypes=[("PDF files", "*.pdf")])
        if file:
            self.pdf_base = file
            self.label_base.configure(text=f"Base: {os.path.basename(file)}")
        self.update_start()

    def select_pdf_source(self):
        file = filedialog.askopenfilename(filetypes=[("PDF files", "*.pdf")])
        if file:
            self.pdf_source = file
            self.skip_source = False
            self.label_source.configure(text=f"Source: {os.path.basename(file)}")
        self.update_start()

    def skip_source_file(self):
        self.pdf_source = None
        self.skip_source = True
        self.label_source.configure(text="Source ignor√© ‚úÖ")
        self.update_start()

    def update_start(self):
        if self.pdf_base and (self.pdf_source or self.skip_source):
            self.start_btn.configure(state="normal")
        else:
            self.start_btn.configure(state="disabled")

    def start_process(self):
        start = time.time()
        self.progress_circle.grid()
        self.progress_circle.set(0.0)

        for d in self.temp_dirs:
            if os.path.exists(d): shutil.rmtree(d)
            os.makedirs(d, exist_ok=True)

        shutil.copy(self.pdf_base, os.path.join(self.temp_dirs[0], "base.pdf"))
        if self.pdf_source:
            shutil.copy(self.pdf_source, os.path.join(self.temp_dirs[0], "source.pdf"))

        self.progress_label.configure(text="‚è≥ Conversion PDF...")
        depose_convert_pdf(self.temp_dirs[0], self.temp_dirs[1])
        self.progress_circle.set(0.33)

        self.progress_label.configure(text="‚è≥ Nettoyage...")
        depose_traitement2(self.temp_dirs[1], self.temp_dirs[2])
        self.progress_circle.set(0.66)

        self.progress_label.configure(text="‚è≥ Extraction Excel...")
        depose_traitement3(self.temp_dirs[2])
        self.final_file = os.path.join(os.getcwd(), "FINAL.xlsx")
        self.progress_circle.set(1.0)

        elapsed = time.time() - start
        self.progress_label.configure(text=f"‚úÖ Termin√© en {elapsed:.2f} sec")
        self.download_btn.grid()

    def download_results(self):
        if self.final_file and os.path.exists(self.final_file):
            save_path = filedialog.asksaveasfilename(defaultextension=".xlsx",
                                                     initialfile=os.path.basename(self.final_file))
            if save_path: shutil.copy(self.final_file, save_path)
            self.progress_label.configure(text="üì• FINAL.xlsx t√©l√©charg√© ‚úÖ")


# =========================
# SPLASH + WELCOME + DASHBOARD
# =========================
class SplashScreen(ctk.CTkFrame):
    def __init__(self, master, logo_path, on_finish=None):
        super().__init__(master, fg_color="#0C1C2C")
        self.master = master
        self.on_finish = on_finish

        frame = ctk.CTkFrame(self, fg_color="#0C1C2C")
        frame.place(relx=0.5, rely=0.5, anchor="center")

        img = Image.open(logo_path)
        img.thumbnail((400, 250))
        self.logo = ImageTk.PhotoImage(img)
        tk.Label(frame, image=self.logo, bg="#0C1C2C").pack(pady=40)

        ctk.CTkLabel(frame, text="‚è≥ On est en train d‚Äôinstaller les modules...\nMerci de votre patience üôè",
                     font=("Segoe UI", 18), text_color="#8CE8FF").pack(pady=10)

        self.after(2500, self.finish)

    def finish(self):
        if self.on_finish: self.on_finish()


class WelcomePage(ctk.CTkFrame):
    def __init__(self, master, on_choice):
        super().__init__(master, fg_color="#0C1C2C")
        frame = ctk.CTkFrame(self, fg_color="#152942", corner_radius=34)
        frame.place(relx=0.5, rely=0.5, anchor="center", relwidth=0.75, relheight=0.75)

        ctk.CTkLabel(frame, text="üëã Bienvenue !", font=("Segoe UI Black", 40, "bold"),
                     text_color="#8CE8FF").pack(pady=(40, 20))
        ctk.CTkLabel(frame, text="Choisissez une option :", font=("Segoe UI", 22),
                     text_color="#B7BEDD").pack(pady=20)

        ctk.CTkButton(frame, text="‚û°Ô∏è C√¢blage/D√©c√¢blage", font=("Segoe UI", 24, "bold"),
                      fg_color="#62EDC5", text_color="#112232",
                      command=lambda: on_choice("Cablage")).pack(pady=30)

        ctk.CTkButton(frame, text="‚û°Ô∏è D√©pose", font=("Segoe UI", 24, "bold"),
                      fg_color="#62EDC5", text_color="#112232",
                      command=lambda: on_choice("Depose")).pack(pady=30)


class Dashboard(ctk.CTkFrame):
    def __init__(self, master, start_page="Cablage"):
        super().__init__(master, fg_color="#0C1C2C")
        self.master = master
        self.current_page = None

        self.grid_rowconfigure(0, weight=1)
        self.grid_columnconfigure(1, weight=1)

        sidebar = ctk.CTkFrame(self, width=240, fg_color="#153242")
        sidebar.grid(row=0, column=0, sticky="ns")
        ctk.CTkLabel(sidebar, text="DASHBOARD", font=("Helvetica", 26, "bold"),
                     text_color="#40D9FF").pack(pady=40)

        ctk.CTkButton(sidebar, text="‚ö° C√¢blage/D√©c√¢blage", font=("Segoe UI", 18),
                      fg_color="#1E4D8C", command=lambda: self.show_page("Cablage")).pack(pady=20, padx=20, fill="x")

        ctk.CTkButton(sidebar, text="üõ†Ô∏è D√©pose", font=("Segoe UI", 18),
                      fg_color="#1E4D8C", command=lambda: self.show_page("Depose")).pack(pady=20, padx=20, fill="x")

        self.content = ctk.CTkFrame(self, fg_color="#0C1C2C")
        self.content.grid(row=0, column=1, sticky="nsew")

        self.show_page(start_page)

    def show_page(self, page_name):
        if self.current_page: self.current_page.destroy()
        if page_name == "Cablage":
            self.current_page = CablagePage(self.content)
        elif page_name == "Depose":
            self.current_page = DeposePage(self.content)
        else:
            self.current_page = ctk.CTkLabel(self.content, text="Erreur : page non trouv√©e")
        self.current_page.pack(fill="both", expand=True)


class MainApp(ctk.CTk):
    def __init__(self):
        super().__init__()
        self.title("Interface Pro")
        self.geometry("1600x950")
        self.configure(fg_color="#0C1C2C")
        self.current_frame = None
        self.show_splash()

    def show_splash(self):
        if self.current_frame: self.current_frame.destroy()
        logo_path = resource_path("INTERFACE/logo.png")
        self.current_frame = SplashScreen(self, logo_path, on_finish=self.show_welcome)
        self.current_frame.pack(fill="both", expand=True)

    def show_welcome(self):
        if self.current_frame: self.current_frame.destroy()
        self.current_frame = WelcomePage(self, self.on_choice)
        self.current_frame.pack(fill="both", expand=True)

    def on_choice(self, choice):
        if self.current_frame: self.current_frame.destroy()
        self.current_frame = Dashboard(self, start_page=choice)
        self.current_frame.pack(fill="both", expand=True)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    ctk.set_appearance_mode("dark")
    ctk.set_default_color_theme("dark-blue")
    app = MainApp()
    app.mainloop()

import os
import shutil
import time
import customtkinter as ctk
from tkinter import filedialog
import fitz  # PyMuPDF (pour compter les pages)

# === IMPORT TES FONCTIONS ===
from CABLAGE_DECABLAGE.Traitement_1 import convert_pdf_folder
from CABLAGE_DECABLAGE.Traitement_2 import Traitement_2
from CABLAGE_DECABLAGE.Traitemnet_3 import Traitemnet_3   # ‚ö†Ô∏è garde l‚Äôorthographe exacte du fichier


class CircularProgress(ctk.CTkCanvas):
    def __init__(self, master, size=100, width=10, fg="#62EDC5", bg="#243148", **kwargs):
        super().__init__(master, width=size, height=size, bg=bg, highlightthickness=0, **kwargs)
        self.size = size
        self.width = width
        self.fg = fg
        self.bgcolor = bg
        self.arc = None
        self.label = self.create_text(size//2, size//2, text="", fill="#B7FF8F", font=("Arial", 17, "bold"))
        self.progress = 0

    def set(self, percent):
        self.progress = percent
        self.delete("arc")
        extent = percent * 359.9
        self.create_oval(
            self.width//2, self.width//2,
            self.size-self.width//2, self.size-self.width//2,
            outline="#384963", width=self.width, tags="arc_bg"
        )
        self.arc = self.create_arc(
            self.width//2, self.width//2,
            self.size-self.width//2, self.size-self.width//2,
            start=90, extent=-extent, style="arc",
            outline=self.fg, width=self.width, tags="arc"
        )
        percent_txt = f"{int(percent*100)}%"
        self.itemconfig(self.label, text=percent_txt)

    def reset(self):
        self.set(0)


class CablagePage(ctk.CTkFrame):
    def __init__(self, master, *args, **kwargs):
        super().__init__(master, *args, **kwargs)

        self.base_dir = os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__))

        self.pdf_file = None
        self.nb_pages = 0
        self.fichier1 = None
        self.fichier2 = None

        # Dossiers temporaires
        self.temp_dirs = [
            os.path.join(self.base_dir, "PDF"),
            os.path.join(self.base_dir, "DATA_BASE"),
            os.path.join(self.base_dir, "DATA_CLEANED"),
            os.path.join(self.base_dir, "EXEL")
        ]

        self.configure(fg_color="#192233")
        self.grid_columnconfigure(0, weight=1)

        title = ctk.CTkLabel(self, text="Cablage D√©cablage",
                             font=("Helvetica", 38, "bold"), text_color="#A8F0E2")
        title.grid(row=0, column=0, pady=(24, 16))

        self.file_box = ctk.CTkFrame(self, fg_color="#243148", corner_radius=20)
        self.file_box.grid(row=1, column=0, padx=80, pady=(0, 18), sticky="ew")
        drop_label = ctk.CTkLabel(self.file_box, text="S√©lectionnez un fichier PDF",
                                  font=("Arial", 20), text_color="#A8F0E2")
        drop_label.pack(pady=16)
        select_btn = ctk.CTkButton(self.file_box, text="Choisir un PDF",
                                   font=("Arial", 16),
                                   fg_color="#415AA2", command=self.select_pdf)
        select_btn.pack()
        self.selected_files_label = ctk.CTkLabel(self.file_box, text="",
                                                 font=("Arial", 14),
                                                 text_color="#F0D48A", wraplength=900)
        self.selected_files_label.pack(pady=4)

        self.progress_circle = CircularProgress(self, size=120, fg="#B7FF8F")
        self.progress_circle.grid(row=2, column=0, pady=10)
        self.progress_circle.grid_remove()

        self.start_btn = ctk.CTkButton(self, text="Lancer le traitement",
                                       font=("Arial", 22, "bold"),
                                       fg_color="#62EDC5", text_color="#112232",
                                       hover_color="#36D399", corner_radius=36, height=64,
                                       state="disabled", command=self.start_process)
        self.start_btn.grid(row=3, column=0, pady=26, padx=220, sticky="ew")

        self.progress_label = ctk.CTkLabel(self, text="",
                                           font=("Arial", 18, "bold"),
                                           text_color="#A8F0E2")
        self.progress_label.grid(row=4, column=0, pady=(10, 10))

        self.download_btn = ctk.CTkButton(self, text="T√©l√©charger R√©sultats",
                                          font=("Arial", 20, "bold"),
                                          fg_color="#FFD966", text_color="#112232",
                                          hover_color="#E6C200", corner_radius=36,
                                          height=54, command=self.download_results)
        self.download_btn.grid(row=5, column=0, pady=(20, 20))
        self.download_btn.grid_remove()

        # üî¥ Bouton Terminer (masqu√© au d√©but)
        self.finish_btn = ctk.CTkButton(self, text="‚ùå Terminer",
                                        font=("Arial", 22, "bold"),
                                        fg_color="#FF4C4C", text_color="white",
                                        hover_color="#CC0000", corner_radius=36, height=64,
                                        command=self.quit_app)
        self.finish_btn.grid(row=6, column=0, pady=(20, 20))
        self.finish_btn.grid_remove()

    def select_pdf(self):
        file = filedialog.askopenfilename(filetypes=[("PDF files", "*.pdf")])
        if file:
            self.pdf_file = file
            with fitz.open(file) as doc:
                self.nb_pages = len(doc)
            self.selected_files_label.configure(
                text=f"‚úÖ Fichier {os.path.basename(file)} charg√© ({self.nb_pages} pages d√©tect√©es)"
            )
            self.start_btn.configure(state="normal")
        else:
            self.pdf_file = None
            self.selected_files_label.configure(text="")
            self.start_btn.configure(state="disabled")

    def start_process(self):
        start_time = time.time()
        self.start_btn.configure(state="disabled")
        self.progress_circle.grid()
        self.progress_circle.set(0.0)

        # Nettoyer/recr√©er les dossiers
        for d in self.temp_dirs:
            if os.path.exists(d):
                shutil.rmtree(d)
            os.makedirs(d, exist_ok=True)

        # √âtape 1: copie PDF
        pdf_dir, db_dir, clean_dir, exel_dir = self.temp_dirs
        dest_pdf = os.path.join(pdf_dir, os.path.basename(self.pdf_file))
        if os.path.abspath(self.pdf_file) != os.path.abspath(dest_pdf):
            shutil.copy(self.pdf_file, dest_pdf)

        self.progress_label.configure(text="üìÑ Conversion PDF ‚Üí Images en cours...")
        self.update()
        convert_pdf_folder(pdf_dir, db_dir)
        self.progress_circle.set(0.33)

        # √âtape 2: classification
        self.progress_label.configure(text="üóÇ Classification / Nettoyage en cours...")
        self.update()
        Traitement_2(db_dir, clean_dir)
        self.progress_circle.set(0.66)

        # √âtape 3: extraction Excel
        self.progress_label.configure(text="üìä Extraction Excel en cours...")
        self.update()
        wb1, wb2 = Traitemnet_3(clean_dir)

        self.fichier1 = os.path.join(exel_dir, "AVANT.xlsx")
        self.fichier2 = os.path.join(exel_dir, "APRES.xlsx")
        wb1.save(self.fichier1)
        wb2.save(self.fichier2)

        self.progress_circle.set(1.0)

        elapsed = time.time() - start_time
        self.progress_label.configure(text=f"‚úÖ Termin√© en {elapsed:.2f} sec")
        self.download_btn.grid()

    def download_results(self):
        if not self.fichier1 or not self.fichier2:
            self.progress_label.configure(text="‚ö†Ô∏è Pas de fichiers g√©n√©r√©s.")
            return
        for fichier in [self.fichier1, self.fichier2]:
            save_path = filedialog.asksaveasfilename(defaultextension=".xlsx",
                                                     initialfile=os.path.basename(fichier))
            if save_path:
                shutil.copy(fichier, save_path)
        self.progress_label.configure(text="üì• Fichiers t√©l√©charg√©s ‚úÖ")
        self.finish_btn.grid()  # üî¥ afficher bouton Terminer apr√®s t√©l√©chargement

    def quit_app(self):
        # Supprimer tous les dossiers temporaires
        for d in self.temp_dirs:
            shutil.rmtree(d, ignore_errors=True)
        self.master.destroy()


if __name__ == "__main__":
    ctk.set_appearance_mode("dark")
    ctk.set_default_color_theme("dark-blue")
    root = ctk.CTk()
    root.title("Cablage D√©cablage")
    root.geometry("1200x820")
    page = CablagePage(root)
    page.pack(fill="both", expand=True)
    root.mainloop()

import os
import shutil
import time
import customtkinter as ctk
from tkinter import filedialog

# === IMPORT TES FONCTIONS ===
from DEPOSE.Traitement_1 import convert_pdf_folder
from DEPOSE.Traitement_2 import Traitement_2
from DEPOSE.Traitemnet_3 import Traitemnet_3


# --- CERCLE PROGRESSION ---
class CircularProgress(ctk.CTkCanvas):
    def __init__(self, master, size=100, width=10, fg="#62EDC5", bg="#243148", **kwargs):
        super().__init__(master, width=size, height=size, bg=bg, highlightthickness=0, **kwargs)
        self.size = size
        self.width = width
        self.fg = fg
        self.label = self.create_text(size // 2, size // 2, text="", fill="#62EDC5", font=("Arial", 17, "bold"))

    def set(self, percent):
        self.delete("arc")
        extent = percent * 359.9
        self.create_arc(
            self.width // 2, self.width // 2,
            self.size - self.width // 2, self.size - self.width // 2,
            start=90, extent=-extent, style="arc",
            outline=self.fg, width=self.width, tags="arc"
        )
        self.itemconfig(self.label, text=f"{int(percent * 100)}%")


# --- PAGE DEPOSE ---
class DeposePage(ctk.CTkFrame):
    def __init__(self, master, *args, **kwargs):
        super().__init__(master, *args, **kwargs)
        self.base_dir = os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__))
        self.pdf_base = None
        self.pdf_source = None
        self.skip_source = False
        self.final_file = None

        # Dossiers temporaires
        self.temp_dirs = [
            os.path.join(self.base_dir, "PDF_TMP"),
            os.path.join(self.base_dir, "DB_TMP"),
            os.path.join(self.base_dir, "CLEAN_TMP")
        ]

        self.configure(fg_color="#192233")
        self.grid_columnconfigure(0, weight=1)

        # === Titre ===
        ctk.CTkLabel(self, text="D√©pose", font=("Helvetica", 38, "bold"), text_color="#62EDC5")\
            .grid(row=0, column=0, pady=(24, 16))

        # === Zone fichiers ===
        self.file_box = ctk.CTkFrame(self, fg_color="#243148", corner_radius=20)
        self.file_box.grid(row=1, column=0, padx=80, pady=(0, 18), sticky="ew")

        ctk.CTkLabel(self.file_box, text="S√©lectionnez vos fichiers PDF",
                     font=("Arial", 20), text_color="#62EDC5").pack(pady=10)

        # Base
        ctk.CTkButton(self.file_box, text="Choisir PDF Base", font=("Arial", 16),
                      fg_color="#415AA2", command=self.select_pdf_base).pack(pady=4)
        self.label_base = ctk.CTkLabel(self.file_box, text="Non s√©lectionn√©", font=("Arial", 14),
                                       text_color="#F0D48A", wraplength=900)
        self.label_base.pack()

        # Source
        ctk.CTkButton(self.file_box, text="Choisir PDF Source", font=("Arial", 16),
                      fg_color="#417AA2", command=self.select_pdf_source).pack(pady=4)
        self.label_source = ctk.CTkLabel(self.file_box, text="Non s√©lectionn√©", font=("Arial", 14),
                                         text_color="#F0D48A", wraplength=900)
        self.label_source.pack()

        # Passer source
        self.skip_btn = ctk.CTkButton(self.file_box, text="Passer PDF Source",
                                      font=("Arial", 14), fg_color="#666666",
                                      command=self.skip_source_file)
        self.skip_btn.pack(pady=6)

        # Cercle progression
        self.progress_circle = CircularProgress(self, size=100, fg="#62EDC5")
        self.progress_circle.grid(row=2, column=0, pady=(0, 10))
        self.progress_circle.grid_remove()

        # Bouton start (vert)
        self.start_btn = ctk.CTkButton(self, text="üöÄ Lancer le traitement",
                                       font=("Arial", 22, "bold"),
                                       fg_color="#62EDC5", text_color="#112232",
                                       hover_color="#36D399", corner_radius=36, height=64,
                                       state="disabled", command=self.start_process)
        self.start_btn.grid(row=3, column=0, pady=26, padx=220, sticky="ew")

        # Label progression
        self.progress_label = ctk.CTkLabel(self, text="", font=("Arial", 18, "bold"), text_color="#A8F0E2")
        self.progress_label.grid(row=4, column=0, pady=(10, 10))

        # Bouton t√©l√©chargement (jaune)
        self.download_btn = ctk.CTkButton(self, text="üì• T√©l√©charger R√©sultat FINAL.xlsx",
                                          font=("Arial", 20, "bold"),
                                          fg_color="#FFD966", text_color="#112232",
                                          hover_color="#E6C200", corner_radius=36,
                                          height=54, command=self.download_results)
        self.download_btn.grid(row=5, column=0, pady=(20, 20))
        self.download_btn.grid_remove()

        # Bouton terminer (rouge) ‚Äî affich√© uniquement apr√®s t√©l√©chargement
        self.finish_btn = ctk.CTkButton(self, text="‚úÖ Terminer",
                                        font=("Arial", 22, "bold"),
                                        fg_color="#FF4C4C", text_color="white",
                                        hover_color="#CC0000", corner_radius=36, height=64,
                                        command=self.quit_page)
        self.finish_btn.grid(row=6, column=0, pady=(20, 20))
        self.finish_btn.grid_remove()

    # --- S√©lection fichiers ---
    def select_pdf_base(self):
        file = filedialog.askopenfilename(filetypes=[("PDF files", "*.pdf")])
        if file:
            self.pdf_base = file
            self.label_base.configure(text=f"Base: {os.path.basename(file)}")
        self.update_start_button()

    def select_pdf_source(self):
        file = filedialog.askopenfilename(filetypes=[("PDF files", "*.pdf")])
        if file:
            self.pdf_source = file
            self.skip_source = False
            self.label_source.configure(text=f"Source: {os.path.basename(file)}")
        self.update_start_button()

    def skip_source_file(self):
        self.pdf_source = None
        self.skip_source = True
        self.label_source.configure(text="PDF source ignor√© ‚úÖ")
        self.update_start_button()

    def update_start_button(self):
        if self.pdf_base and (self.pdf_source or self.skip_source):
            self.start_btn.configure(state="normal")
        else:
            self.start_btn.configure(state="disabled")

    # --- Lancer le traitement ---
    def start_process(self):
        start_global = time.time()
        self.start_btn.configure(state="disabled")
        self.progress_circle.grid()
        self.progress_circle.set(0.0)
        self.update()

        # Nettoyer / recr√©er dossiers temporaires
        for d in self.temp_dirs:
            if os.path.exists(d):
                shutil.rmtree(d)
            os.makedirs(d, exist_ok=True)

        # Copier fichiers
        shutil.copy(self.pdf_base, os.path.join(self.temp_dirs[0], "base.pdf"))
        if self.pdf_source:
            shutil.copy(self.pdf_source, os.path.join(self.temp_dirs[0], "source.pdf"))

        # √âtape 1
        self.progress_label.configure(text="‚è≥ Conversion PDF...")
        self.update()
        convert_pdf_folder(self.temp_dirs[0], self.temp_dirs[1])
        self.progress_circle.set(0.33)

        # √âtape 2
        self.progress_label.configure(text="‚è≥ Classification / Nettoyage...")
        self.update()
        Traitement_2(self.temp_dirs[1], self.temp_dirs[2])
        self.progress_circle.set(0.66)

        # √âtape 3
        self.progress_label.configure(text="‚è≥ Extraction Excel...")
        self.update()
        Traitemnet_3(self.temp_dirs[2])   # g√©n√®re FINAL.xlsx
        self.final_file = os.path.join(os.getcwd(), "FINAL.xlsx")
        self.progress_circle.set(1.0)

        elapsed = time.time() - start_global
        mins, secs = divmod(int(elapsed), 60)
        self.progress_label.configure(text=f"‚úÖ Termin√© en {mins}m {secs}s")

        self.download_btn.grid()

    def download_results(self):
        if not self.final_file or not os.path.exists(self.final_file):
            self.progress_label.configure(text="‚ö†Ô∏è Aucun fichier FINAL.xlsx trouv√©.")
            return
        save_path = filedialog.asksaveasfilename(defaultextension=".xlsx",
                                                 initialfile=os.path.basename(self.final_file))
        if save_path:
            shutil.copy(self.final_file, save_path)
            self.progress_label.configure(text="üì• FINAL.xlsx t√©l√©charg√© ‚úÖ")
            self.finish_btn.grid()  # afficher le bouton Terminer uniquement apr√®s t√©l√©chargement

    def quit_page(self):
        # Supprimer tous les dossiers temporaires
        for d in self.temp_dirs:
            shutil.rmtree(d, ignore_errors=True)
        if self.final_file and os.path.exists(self.final_file):
            os.remove(self.final_file)  # supprimer FINAL.xlsx aussi
        self.master.destroy()


# --- MAIN ---
if __name__ == "__main__":
    ctk.set_appearance_mode("dark")
    ctk.set_default_color_theme("dark-blue")
    root = ctk.CTk()
    root.title("D√©pose")
    root.geometry("1200x820")
    page = DeposePage(root)
    page.pack(fill="both", expand=True)
    root.mainloop()

import os
import sys
import threading
import tkinter as tk
import customtkinter as ctk
from PIL import Image, ImageTk

# Stockage global
LOADED_PAGES = {}


def resource_path(relative_path: str) -> str:
    """Donne le bon chemin (m√™me apr√®s compilation en .exe avec PyInstaller)"""
    try:
        base_path = sys._MEIPASS
    except Exception:
        base_path = os.path.abspath(".")
    return os.path.join(base_path, relative_path)


# =========================
# SPLASH SCREEN
# =========================
class SplashScreen(ctk.CTkFrame):
    def __init__(self, master, logo_path, on_finish=None):
        super().__init__(master, fg_color="#0C1C2C")
        self.master = master
        self.on_finish = on_finish

        container = ctk.CTkFrame(self, fg_color="#0C1C2C")
        container.place(relx=0.5, rely=0.5, anchor="center")

        img = Image.open(logo_path)
        img.thumbnail((500, 300))
        self.logo = ImageTk.PhotoImage(img)
        self.label_logo = tk.Label(container, image=self.logo, bg="#0C1C2C")
        self.label_logo.pack(pady=40)

        self.label_text = ctk.CTkLabel(
            container,
            text="‚è≥ On est en train d‚Äôinstaller tous les modules‚Ä¶\nMerci de votre patience üôè",
            font=("Segoe UI", 18),
            text_color="#8CE8FF"
        )
        self.label_text.pack(pady=10)

        self.canvas = tk.Canvas(container, width=140, height=140,
                                bg="#0C1C2C", highlightthickness=0)
        self.canvas.pack(pady=20)
        self.arc = self.canvas.create_arc(20, 20, 120, 120,
                                          start=0, extent=90,
                                          outline="#3B82F6", width=10, style="arc")
        self.angle = 0
        self.animate()

        threading.Thread(target=self.preload_pages, daemon=True).start()

    def animate(self):
        self.angle = (self.angle + 10) % 360
        self.canvas.itemconfig(self.arc, start=self.angle)
        self.after(50, self.animate)

    def preload_pages(self):
        """On importe les pages AVANT WelcomePage"""
        global LOADED_PAGES
        try:
            import Page_1
            import page_2
            LOADED_PAGES["Cablage"] = Page_1.CablagePage
            LOADED_PAGES["Depose"] = page_2.DeposePage
            print("‚úÖ Pages charg√©es :", list(LOADED_PAGES.keys()))
        except Exception as e:
            print("‚ùå Erreur import:", e)

        self.master.after(500, self.finish)

    def finish(self):
        if self.on_finish:
            self.on_finish()


# =========================
# WELCOME PAGE
# =========================
class WelcomePage(ctk.CTkFrame):
    def __init__(self, master, on_choice):
        super().__init__(master, fg_color="#0C1C2C")
        frame = ctk.CTkFrame(self, fg_color="#152942", corner_radius=34)
        frame.place(relx=0.5, rely=0.5, anchor="center", relwidth=0.75, relheight=0.75)

        ctk.CTkLabel(frame, text="üëã Bienvenue !",
                     font=("Segoe UI Black", 40, "bold"),
                     text_color="#8CE8FF").pack(pady=(40, 20))

        ctk.CTkButton(frame, text="‚û°Ô∏è C√¢blage/D√©c√¢blage",
                      font=("Segoe UI", 24, "bold"),
                      fg_color="#62EDC5", text_color="#112232",
                      corner_radius=25, height=80, width=400,
                      command=lambda: on_choice("Cablage")).pack(pady=30)

        ctk.CTkButton(frame, text="‚û°Ô∏è D√©pose",
                      font=("Segoe UI", 24, "bold"),
                      fg_color="#62EDC5", text_color="#112232",
                      corner_radius=25, height=80, width=400,
                      command=lambda: on_choice("Depose")).pack(pady=30)


# =========================
# DASHBOARD
# =========================
class Dashboard(ctk.CTkFrame):
    def __init__(self, master, start_page="Cablage"):
        super().__init__(master, fg_color="#0C1C2C")
        self.master = master
        self.current_page = None
        self.nav_buttons = {}

        self.grid_rowconfigure(0, weight=1)
        self.grid_columnconfigure(1, weight=1)

        sidebar = ctk.CTkFrame(self, width=240, corner_radius=0, fg_color="#153242")
        sidebar.grid(row=0, column=0, sticky="ns")
        self.content = ctk.CTkFrame(self, fg_color="#0C1C2C")
        self.content.grid(row=0, column=1, sticky="nsew")

        self.add_nav_button(sidebar, "Cablage", "‚ö° C√¢blage/D√©c√¢blage")
        self.add_nav_button(sidebar, "Depose", "üõ†Ô∏è D√©pose")

        self.show_page(start_page)

    def add_nav_button(self, parent, page_name, label):
        btn = ctk.CTkButton(parent, text=label,
                            font=("Segoe UI", 18),
                            fg_color="#1E4D8C", hover_color="#2A5D9F",
                            corner_radius=12, height=50,
                            command=lambda p=page_name: self.show_page(p))
        btn.pack(pady=20, padx=20, fill="x")
        self.nav_buttons[page_name] = btn

    def show_page(self, page_name):
        if self.current_page:
            self.current_page.destroy()

        for name, btn in self.nav_buttons.items():
            btn.configure(fg_color="#1E4D8C")
        if page_name in self.nav_buttons:
            self.nav_buttons[page_name].configure(fg_color="#2A5D9F")

        page_class = LOADED_PAGES.get(page_name)
        if page_class:
            self.current_page = page_class(self.content)
        else:
            self.current_page = ctk.CTkLabel(self.content, text="‚ùå Page introuvable")
        self.current_page.pack(fill="both", expand=True)


# =========================
# MAIN APP
# =========================
import os
import ctypes

class MainApp(ctk.CTk):
    def __init__(self):
        super().__init__()
        # --- Nouveau titre ---
        self.title("SEGULA")

        # --- Nouvelle ic√¥ne ---
        icon_path = resource_path("channels4_profile.ico")
        if os.path.exists(icon_path):
            self.iconbitmap(icon_path)

            # ‚ö° Astuce pour que l'ic√¥ne apparaisse aussi dans la barre des t√¢ches
            myappid = u"segula.interface.pro"  # identifiant unique
            ctypes.windll.shell32.SetCurrentProcessExplicitAppUserModelID(myappid)

        # --- Config fen√™tre ---
        self.geometry("1600x950")
        self.configure(fg_color="#0C1C2C")
        self.current_frame = None
        self.show_splash()

    def show_splash(self):
        if self.current_frame:
            self.current_frame.destroy()
        logo_path = resource_path("logo.png")
        self.current_frame = SplashScreen(self, logo_path, on_finish=self.show_welcome)
        self.current_frame.pack(fill="both", expand=True)

    def show_welcome(self):
        if self.current_frame:
            self.current_frame.destroy()
        self.current_frame = WelcomePage(self, self.on_choice)
        self.current_frame.pack(fill="both", expand=True)

    def on_choice(self, choice):
        if self.current_frame:
            self.current_frame.destroy()
        self.current_frame = Dashboard(self, start_page=choice)
        self.current_frame.pack(fill="both", expand=True)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    ctk.set_appearance_mode("dark")
    ctk.set_default_color_theme("dark-blue")
    app = MainApp()
    app.mainloop()

import os
import sys
import subprocess
import tkinter as tk
from tkinter import messagebox

def show_guide_message():
    """Affiche une fen√™tre avec le message d‚Äôaide."""
    root = tk.Tk()
    root.withdraw()  # cacher la fen√™tre principale
    messagebox.showerror(
        "Erreur",
        "‚ùå Fichier introuvable.\n\nPlease read the user guide / Veuillez lire le guide d‚Äôutilisateur svp."
    )
    root.destroy()

def run_main():
    # üìÇ Dossier principal
    base_dir = r"C:\SEGULA"
    script_name = "page_main.py"
    app_main = os.path.join(base_dir, script_name)

    # V√©rifier script principal
    if not os.path.exists(app_main):
        show_guide_message()
        sys.exit(1)

    # üîé Chercher Python dans C:\Python\Python310
    python_exe = r"C:\Python\Python310\python.exe"

    if not os.path.exists(python_exe):
        show_guide_message()
        sys.exit(1)

    # Ex√©cution si tout est OK (‚ö†Ô∏è sans ouvrir de console noire)
    workdir = os.path.dirname(app_main)
    print(f"‚û°Ô∏è Lancement de {app_main} avec {python_exe} ...")

    try:
        subprocess.run(
            [python_exe, app_main],
            cwd=workdir,
            creationflags=subprocess.CREATE_NO_WINDOW  # ‚úÖ pas de console
        )
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"‚ùå Erreur lors du lancement : {e}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    run_main()

parts: si j'ai bien compris il y a le n√©cessaire pour lancer le projet par fichier ?

Exactement ‚úÖ  

Ton projet est structur√© de fa√ßon √† pouvoir √™tre lanc√© **de plusieurs mani√®res**, selon ton besoin :  

---

### üîπ **Ex√©cuter les modules de traitement seuls**
- `CABLAGE_DECABLAGE/Traitement_1.py` ‚Üí Convertit le PDF en images.  
- `CABLAGE_DECABLAGE/Traitement_2.py` ‚Üí Trie et nettoie les images (FOLIO / LOT).  
- `CABLAGE_DECABLAGE/Traitemnet_3.py` ‚Üí Produit les fichiers Excel.  

Idem c√¥t√© **DEPOSE/**.  
üëâ Tu peux lancer ces fichiers directement en **ligne de commande** pour tester la logique sans interface.

---

### üîπ **Ex√©cuter une page sp√©cifique avec interface**
- `Page_1.py` ‚Üí Lance uniquement l‚Äôinterface **C√¢blage/D√©c√¢blage**.  
- `page_2.py` ‚Üí Lance uniquement l‚Äôinterface **D√©pose**.

---

### üîπ **Ex√©cuter l‚Äôinterface compl√®te**
- `main.py` ‚Üí Version ‚Äúdashboard‚Äù qui int√®gre **les deux modules** (C√¢blage + D√©pose) dans une seule fen√™tre.  
- `page_main.py` ‚Üí Version am√©lior√©e/professionnelle (ic√¥ne, splash anim√©, sidebar).  
üëâ C‚Äôest la version **√† utiliser en production**.

---

### üîπ **Ex√©cuter comme application install√©e**
- `run.py` ‚Üí Sert de **lanceur Windows** :
  - V√©rifie la pr√©sence de Python.
  - Lance `page_main.py` directement **sans ouvrir de console**.
  - Affiche un message d‚Äôerreur clair si probl√®me d‚Äôinstallation.

---

‚úÖ Donc oui, tu as bien **tout le n√©cessaire pour lancer le projet par fichier** :
- **Bas niveau** (traitements seuls).  
- **Interface sp√©cifique** (Page_1 / page_2).  
- **Interface compl√®te** (main / page_main).

---

Veux-tu que je te fasse un **guide d‚Äôutilisation clair** (genre manuel utilisateur), qui dit **quel fichier lancer dans quel cas** ?
okay, tu a compris en quoi consiste le logiciel en gros ?

Oui üëç j‚Äôai bien compris la logique globale de ton logiciel.  

En r√©sum√©, c‚Äôest un **outil d‚Äôautomatisation pour traiter des plans √©lectriques au format PDF** et en ressortir des **fichiers Excel exploitables**.  

---

### ‚öôÔ∏è **Pipeline technique**
1. **Entr√©e utilisateur** : un ou plusieurs **PDF de plans √©lectriques** (selon le mode choisi).  
2. **Conversion** :  
   - Les PDF sont convertis en **images haute r√©solution (900 DPI)**.  
3. **Nettoyage & Classification (IA + OCR)** :  
   - V√©rifie si l‚Äôimage est bien un **folio** (utile).  
   - Trie les folios en **LOT_2** ou **LOT_3** selon des crit√®res de couleurs (rouge/violet) + analyse visuelle.  
   - Corrige l‚Äôorientation (portrait/paysage).  
   - √âlimine le bruit visuel inutile (texte, lignes).  
4. **Extraction Excel** :  
   - G√©n√®re des tableaux structur√©s dans Excel (CABLAGE = AVANT / APRES, D√âPOSE = FINAL).  
   - Harmonise certaines colonnes (colonne R).  

---

### üñ•Ô∏è **Interface utilisateur (CustomTkinter)**
- **Accueil** ‚Üí Splash screen avec logo et chargement.  
- **Menu principal** ‚Üí choix entre deux modules :
  - **C√¢blage/D√©c√¢blage**  
    - Entr√©e : 1 PDF.  
    - Sortie : deux fichiers Excel ‚Üí **AVANT.xlsx** et **APRES.xlsx**.  
  - **D√©pose**  
    - Entr√©e : 1 PDF ‚ÄúBase‚Äù + 1 PDF ‚ÄúSource‚Äù (ou ignorer la source).  
    - Sortie : un fichier Excel **FINAL.xlsx**.  
- **Suivi visuel** ‚Üí cercle de progression + messages d‚Äô√©tapes.  
- **Export** ‚Üí bouton de t√©l√©chargement des fichiers g√©n√©r√©s.  

---

### üéØ **Objectif du logiciel**
üëâ Automatiser un travail qui √©tait auparavant **manuel et chronophage** :  
- ouvrir chaque folio,  
- trier, nettoyer,  
- recopier les infos dans Excel.  

D√©sormais, en **quelques clics**, l‚Äôutilisateur charge un PDF et r√©cup√®re directement les fichiers Excel exploitables.

---

Veux-tu que je t‚Äôen fasse une **version ultra-simplifi√©e (style elevator pitch)** que tu pourrais r√©utiliser pour expliquer le projet en entretien ou sur ton blog de stage ?
exactement la avec l'interface j'ai lanc√© un essai avec d√©pose, mais √ßa reste a 66% Quel fichier je dois lancer pour essayer ?

Parfait üëç tu as bien suivi !  

Si ton traitement **D√©pose** reste bloqu√© √† **66%**, √ßa veut dire que :  

- **√âtape 1 (PDF ‚Üí images)** = OK ‚úÖ  
- **√âtape 2 (classification/nettoyage)** = OK ‚úÖ  
- **√âtape 3 (Extraction Excel)** = ‚ö†Ô∏è c‚Äôest ici que √ßa bloque (appel √† `Traitemnet_3`).  

---

### üìÇ Les fichiers que tu peux lancer pour tester
- **Test uniquement D√©pose (interface isol√©e)**  
  üëâ Lance **`page_2.py`** „Äê42‚Ä†source„Äë  
  ‚Üí √áa ouvre directement l‚Äôinterface D√©pose (sans passer par menu, splash, etc.).  
  Tu verras si √ßa coince toujours √† 66%.  

- **Test l‚Äôapplication compl√®te**  
  üëâ Lance **`page_main.py`** „Äê43‚Ä†source„Äë  
  ‚Üí C‚Äôest la version finale : tu auras le splash screen + choix entre *C√¢blage* ou *D√©pose*.  

- **Test minimal (sans interface, juste le traitement)**  
  üëâ Va dans `DEPOSE/Traitemnet_3.py` et ex√©cute-le directement.  
  ‚Üí Comme √ßa tu vois si le probl√®me vient du pipeline Excel lui-m√™me (probablement).

---

### üõ†Ô∏è Ce que je te conseille
1. **D‚Äôabord tester `page_2.py`** ‚Üí tu verras si √ßa plante pareil.  
2. Si oui ‚Üí lancer directement `DEPOSE/Traitemnet_3.py` pour voir l‚Äôerreur console (car l‚Äôinterface masque les d√©tails).  

---

- **D√©pose isol√©e** = `page_2.py`  
- **Appli finale** = `page_main.py`

metadata.text:
import os
import shutil
import time
import customtkinter as ctk
from tkinter import filedialog

# === IMPORT TES FONCTIONS ===
from DEPOSE.Traitement_1 import convert_pdf_folder
from DEPOSE.Traitement_2 import Traitement_2
from DEPOSE.Traitemnet_3 import Traitemnet_3


# --- CERCLE PROGRESSION ---
class CircularProgress(ctk.CTkCanvas):
    def __init__(self, master, size=100, width=10, fg="#62EDC5", bg="#243148", **kwargs):
        super().__init__(master, width=size, height=size, bg=bg, highlightthickness=0, **kwargs)
        self.size = size
        self.width = width
        self.fg = fg
        self.label = self.create_text(size // 2, size // 2, text="", fill="#62EDC5", font=("Arial", 17, "bold"))

    def set(self, percent):
        self.delete("arc")
        extent = percent * 359.9
        self.create_arc(
            self.width // 2, self.width // 2,
            self.size - self.width // 2, self.size - self.width // 2,
            start=90, extent=-extent, style="arc",
            outline=self.fg, width=self.width, tags="arc"
        )
        self.itemconfig(self.label, text=f"{int(percent * 100)}%")


# --- PAGE DEPOSE ---
class DeposePage(ctk.CTkFrame):
    def __init__(self, master, *args, **kwargs):
        super().__init__(master, *args, **kwargs)
        self.base_dir = os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__))
        self.pdf_base = None
        self.pdf_source = None
        self.skip_source = False
        self.final_file = None

        # Dossiers temporaires
        self.temp_dirs = [
            os.path.join(self.base_dir, "PDF_TMP"),
            os.path.join(self.base_dir, "DB_TMP"),
            os.path.join(self.base_dir, "CLEAN_TMP")
        ]

        self.configure(fg_color="#192233")
        self.grid_columnconfigure(0, weight=1)

        # === Titre ===
        ctk.CTkLabel(self, text="D√©pose", font=("Helvetica", 38, "bold"), text_color="#62EDC5")\
            .grid(row=0, column=0, pady=(24, 16))

        # === Zone fichiers ===
        self.file_box = ctk.CTkFrame(self, fg_color="#243148", corner_radius=20)
        self.file_box.grid(row=1, column=0, padx=80, pady=(0, 18), sticky="ew")

        ctk.CTkLabel(self.file_box, text="S√©lectionnez vos fichiers PDF",
                     font=("Arial", 20), text_color="#62EDC5").pack(pady=10)

        # Base
        ctk.CTkButton(self.file_box, text="Choisir PDF Base", font=("Arial", 16),
                      fg_color="#415AA2", command=self.select_pdf_base).pack(pady=4)
        self.label_base = ctk.CTkLabel(self.file_box, text="Non s√©lectionn√©", font=("Arial", 14),
                                       text_color="#F0D48A", wraplength=900)
        self.label_base.pack()

        # Source
        ctk.CTkButton(self.file_box, text="Choisir PDF Source", font=("Arial", 16),
                      fg_color="#417AA2", command=self.select_pdf_source).pack(pady=4)
        self.label_source = ctk.CTkLabel(self.file_box, text="Non s√©lectionn√©", font=("Arial", 14),
                                         text_color="#F0D48A", wraplength=900)
        self.label_source.pack()

        # Passer source
        self.skip_btn = ctk.CTkButton(self.file_box, text="Passer PDF Source",
                                      font=("Arial", 14), fg_color="#666666",
                                      command=self.skip_source_file)
        self.skip_btn.pack(pady=6)

        # Cercle progression
        self.progress_circle = CircularProgress(self, size=100, fg="#62EDC5")
        self.progress_circle.grid(row=2, column=0, pady=(0, 10))
        self.progress_circle.grid_remove()

        # Bouton start (vert)
        self.start_btn = ctk.CTkButton(self, text="üöÄ Lancer le traitement",
                                       font=("Arial", 22, "bold"),
                                       fg_color="#62EDC5", text_color="#112232",
                                       hover_color="#36D399", corner_radius=36, height=64,
                                       state="disabled", command=self.start_process)
        self.start_btn.grid(row=3, column=0, pady=26, padx=220, sticky="ew")

        # Label progression
        self.progress_label = ctk.CTkLabel(self, text="", font=("Arial", 18, "bold"), text_color="#A8F0E2")
        self.progress_label.grid(row=4, column=0, pady=(10, 10))

        # Bouton t√©l√©chargement (jaune)
        self.download_btn = ctk.CTkButton(self, text="üì• T√©l√©charger R√©sultat FINAL.xlsx",
                                          font=("Arial", 20, "bold"),
                                          fg_color="#FFD966", text_color="#112232",
                                          hover_color="#E6C200", corner_radius=36,
                                          height=54, command=self.download_results)
        self.download_btn.grid(row=5, column=0, pady=(20, 20))
        self.download_btn.grid_remove()

        # Bouton terminer (rouge) ‚Äî affich√© uniquement apr√®s t√©l√©chargement
        self.finish_btn = ctk.CTkButton(self, text="‚úÖ Terminer",
                                        font=("Arial", 22, "bold"),
                                        fg_color="#FF4C4C", text_color="white",
                                        hover_color="#CC0000", corner_radius=36, height=64,
                                        command=self.quit_page)
        self.finish_btn.grid(row=6, column=0, pady=(20, 20))
        self.finish_btn.grid_remove()

    # --- S√©lection fichiers ---
    def select_pdf_base(self):
        file = filedialog.askopenfilename(filetypes=[("PDF files", "*.pdf")])
        if file:
            self.pdf_base = file
            self.label_base.configure(text=f"Base: {os.path.basename(file)}")
        self.update_start_button()

    def select_pdf_source(self):
        file = filedialog.askopenfilename(filetypes=[("PDF files", "*.pdf")])
        if file:
            self.pdf_source = file
            self.skip_source = False
            self.label_source.configure(text=f"Source: {os.path.basename(file)}")
        self.update_start_button()

    def skip_source_file(self):
        self.pdf_source = None
        self.skip_source = True
        self.label_source.configure(text="PDF source ignor√© ‚úÖ")
        self.update_start_button()

    def update_start_button(self):
        if self.pdf_base and (self.pdf_source or self.skip_source):
            self.start_btn.configure(state="normal")
        else:
            self.start_btn.configure(state="disabled")

    # --- Lancer le traitement ---
    def start_process(self):
        start_global = time.time()
        self.start_btn.configure(state="disabled")
        self.progress_circle.grid()
        self.progress_circle.set(0.0)
        self.update()

        # Nettoyer / recr√©er dossiers temporaires
        for d in self.temp_dirs:
            if os.path.exists(d):
                shutil.rmtree(d)
            os.makedirs(d, exist_ok=True)

        # Copier fichiers
        shutil.copy(self.pdf_base, os.path.join(self.temp_dirs[0], "base.pdf"))
        if self.pdf_source:
            shutil.copy(self.pdf_source, os.path.join(self.temp_dirs[0], "source.pdf"))

        # √âtape 1
        self.progress_label.configure(text="‚è≥ Conversion PDF...")
        self.update()
        convert_pdf_folder(self.temp_dirs[0], self.temp_dirs[1])
        self.progress_circle.set(0.33)

        # √âtape 2
        self.progress_label.configure(text="‚è≥ Classification / Nettoyage...")
        self.update()
        Traitement_2(self.temp_dirs[1], self.temp_dirs[2])
        self.progress_circle.set(0.66)

        # √âtape 3
        self.progress_label.configure(text="‚è≥ Extraction Excel...")
        self.update()
        Traitemnet_3(self.temp_dirs[2])   # g√©n√®re FINAL.xlsx
        self.final_file = os.path.join(os.getcwd(), "FINAL.xlsx")
        self.progress_circle.set(1.0)

        elapsed = time.time() - start_global
        mins, secs = divmod(int(elapsed), 60)
        self.progress_label.configure(text=f"‚úÖ Termin√© en {mins}m {secs}s")

        self.download_btn.grid()

    def download_results(self):
        if not self.final_file or not os.path.exists(self.final_file):
            self.progress_label.configure(text="‚ö†Ô∏è Aucun fichier FINAL.xlsx trouv√©.")
            return
        save_path = filedialog.asksaveasfilename(defaultextension=".xlsx",
                                                 initialfile=os.path.basename(self.final_file))
        if save_path:
            shutil.copy(self.final_file, save_path)
            self.progress_label.configure(text="üì• FINAL.xlsx t√©l√©charg√© ‚úÖ")
            self.finish_btn.grid()  # afficher le bouton Terminer uniquement apr√®s t√©l√©chargement

    def quit_page(self):
        # Supprimer tous les dossiers temporaires
        for d in self.temp_dirs:
            shutil.rmtree(d, ignore_errors=True)
        if self.final_file and os.path.exists(self.final_file):
            os.remove(self.final_file)  # supprimer FINAL.xlsx aussi
        self.master.destroy()


# --- MAIN ---
if __name__ == "__main__":
    ctk.set_appearance_mode("dark")
    ctk.set_default_color_theme("dark-blue")
    root = ctk.CTk()
    root.title("D√©pose")
    root.geometry("1200x820")
    page = DeposePage(root)
    page.pack(fill="both", expand=True)
    root.mainloop()

metadata.name: page_main.py
metadata.text:
import os
import sys
import threading
import tkinter as tk
import customtkinter as ctk
from PIL import Image, ImageTk

# Stockage global
LOADED_PAGES = {}


def resource_path(relative_path: str) -> str:
    """Donne le bon chemin (m√™me apr√®s compilation en .exe avec PyInstaller)"""
    try:
        base_path = sys._MEIPASS
    except Exception:
        base_path = os.path.abspath(".")
    return os.path.join(base_path, relative_path)


# =========================
# SPLASH SCREEN
# =========================
class SplashScreen(ctk.CTkFrame):
    def __init__(self, master, logo_path, on_finish=None):
        super().__init__(master, fg_color="#0C1C2C")
        self.master = master
        self.on_finish = on_finish

        container = ctk.CTkFrame(self, fg_color="#0C1C2C")
        container.place(relx=0.5, rely=0.5, anchor="center")

        img = Image.open(logo_path)
        img.thumbnail((500, 300))
        self.logo = ImageTk.PhotoImage(img)
        self.label_logo = tk.Label(container, image=self.logo, bg="#0C1C2C")
        self.label_logo.pack(pady=40)

        self.label_text = ctk.CTkLabel(
            container,
            text="‚è≥ On est en train d‚Äôinstaller tous les modules‚Ä¶\nMerci de votre patience üôè",
            font=("Segoe UI", 18),
            text_color="#8CE8FF"
        )
        self.label_text.pack(pady=10)

        self.canvas = tk.Canvas(container, width=140, height=140,
                                bg="#0C1C2C", highlightthickness=0)
        self.canvas.pack(pady=20)
        self.arc = self.canvas.create_arc(20, 20, 120, 120,
                                          start=0, extent=90,
                                          outline="#3B82F6", width=10, style="arc")
        self.angle = 0
        self.animate()

        threading.Thread(target=self.preload_pages, daemon=True).start()

    def animate(self):
        self.angle = (self.angle + 10) % 360
        self.canvas.itemconfig(self.arc, start=self.angle)
        self.after(50, self.animate)

    def preload_pages(self):
        """On importe les pages AVANT WelcomePage"""
        global LOADED_PAGES
        try:
            import Page_1
            import page_2
            LOADED_PAGES["Cablage"] = Page_1.CablagePage
            LOADED_PAGES["Depose"] = page_2.DeposePage
            print("‚úÖ Pages charg√©es :", list(LOADED_PAGES.keys()))
        except Exception as e:
            print("‚ùå Erreur import:", e)

        self.master.after(500, self.finish)

    def finish(self):
        if self.on_finish:
            self.on_finish()


# =========================
# WELCOME PAGE
# =========================
class WelcomePage(ctk.CTkFrame):
    def __init__(self, master, on_choice):
        super().__init__(master, fg_color="#0C1C2C")
        frame = ctk.CTkFrame(self, fg_color="#152942", corner_radius=34)
        frame.place(relx=0.5, rely=0.5, anchor="center", relwidth=0.75, relheight=0.75)

        ctk.CTkLabel(frame, text="üëã Bienvenue !",
                     font=("Segoe UI Black", 40, "bold"),
                     text_color="#8CE8FF").pack(pady=(40, 20))

        ctk.CTkButton(frame, text="‚û°Ô∏è C√¢blage/D√©c√¢blage",
                      font=("Segoe UI", 24, "bold"),
                      fg_color="#62EDC5", text_color="#112232",
                      corner_radius=25, height=80, width=400,
                      command=lambda: on_choice("Cablage")).pack(pady=30)

        ctk.CTkButton(frame, text="‚û°Ô∏è D√©pose",
                      font=("Segoe UI", 24, "bold"),
                      fg_color="#62EDC5", text_color="#112232",
                      corner_radius=25, height=80, width=400,
                      command=lambda: on_choice("Depose")).pack(pady=30)


# =========================
# DASHBOARD
# =========================
class Dashboard(ctk.CTkFrame):
    def __init__(self, master, start_page="Cablage"):
        super().__init__(master, fg_color="#0C1C2C")
        self.master = master
        self.current_page = None
        self.nav_buttons = {}

        self.grid_rowconfigure(0, weight=1)
        self.grid_columnconfigure(1, weight=1)

        sidebar = ctk.CTkFrame(self, width=240, corner_radius=0, fg_color="#153242")
        sidebar.grid(row=0, column=0, sticky="ns")
        self.content = ctk.CTkFrame(self, fg_color="#0C1C2C")
        self.content.grid(row=0, column=1, sticky="nsew")

        self.add_nav_button(sidebar, "Cablage", "‚ö° C√¢blage/D√©c√¢blage")
        self.add_nav_button(sidebar, "Depose", "üõ†Ô∏è D√©pose")

        self.show_page(start_page)

    def add_nav_button(self, parent, page_name, label):
        btn = ctk.CTkButton(parent, text=label,
                            font=("Segoe UI", 18),
                            fg_color="#1E4D8C", hover_color="#2A5D9F",
                            corner_radius=12, height=50,
                            command=lambda p=page_name: self.show_page(p))
        btn.pack(pady=20, padx=20, fill="x")
        self.nav_buttons[page_name] = btn

    def show_page(self, page_name):
        if self.current_page:
            self.current_page.destroy()

        for name, btn in self.nav_buttons.items():
            btn.configure(fg_color="#1E4D8C")
        if page_name in self.nav_buttons:
            self.nav_buttons[page_name].configure(fg_color="#2A5D9F")

        page_class = LOADED_PAGES.get(page_name)
        if page_class:
            self.current_page = page_class(self.content)
        else:
            self.current_page = ctk.CTkLabel(self.content, text="‚ùå Page introuvable")
        self.current_page.pack(fill="both", expand=True)


# =========================
# MAIN APP
# =========================
import os
import ctypes

class MainApp(ctk.CTk):
    def __init__(self):
        super().__init__()
        # --- Nouveau titre ---
        self.title("SEGULA")

        # --- Nouvelle ic√¥ne ---
        icon_path = resource_path("channels4_profile.ico")
        if os.path.exists(icon_path):
            self.iconbitmap(icon_path)

            # ‚ö° Astuce pour que l'ic√¥ne apparaisse aussi dans la barre des t√¢ches
            myappid = u"segula.interface.pro"  # identifiant unique
            ctypes.windll.shell32.SetCurrentProcessExplicitAppUserModelID(myappid)

        # --- Config fen√™tre ---
        self.geometry("1600x950")
        self.configure(fg_color="#0C1C2C")
        self.current_frame = None
        self.show_splash()

    def show_splash(self):
        if self.current_frame:
            self.current_frame.destroy()
        logo_path = resource_path("logo.png")
        self.current_frame = SplashScreen(self, logo_path, on_finish=self.show_welcome)
        self.current_frame.pack(fill="both", expand=True)

    def show_welcome(self):
        if self.current_frame:
            self.current_frame.destroy()
        self.current_frame = WelcomePage(self, self.on_choice)
        self.current_frame.pack(fill="both", expand=True)

    def on_choice(self, choice):
        if self.current_frame:
            self.current_frame.destroy()
        self.current_frame = Dashboard(self, start_page=choice)
        self.current_frame.pack(fill="both", expand=True)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    ctk.set_appearance_mode("dark")
    ctk.set_default_color_theme("dark-blue")
    app = MainApp()
    app.mainloop()

import os
import shutil
import time
import customtkinter as ctk
from tkinter import filedialog

# === IMPORT TES FONCTIONS ===
from DEPOSE.Traitement_1 import convert_pdf_folder
from DEPOSE.Traitement_2 import Traitement_2
from DEPOSE.Traitemnet_3 import Traitemnet_3


# --- CERCLE PROGRESSION ---
class CircularProgress(ctk.CTkCanvas):
    def __init__(self, master, size=100, width=10, fg="#62EDC5", bg="#243148", **kwargs):
        super().__init__(master, width=size, height=size, bg=bg, highlightthickness=0, **kwargs)
        self.size = size
        self.width = width
        self.fg = fg
        self.label = self.create_text(size // 2, size // 2, text="", fill="#62EDC5", font=("Arial", 17, "bold"))

    def set(self, percent):
        self.delete("arc")
        extent = percent * 359.9
        self.create_arc(
            self.width // 2, self.width // 2,
            self.size - self.width // 2, self.size - self.width // 2,
            start=90, extent=-extent, style="arc",
            outline=self.fg, width=self.width, tags="arc"
        )
        self.itemconfig(self.label, text=f"{int(percent * 100)}%")


# --- PAGE DEPOSE ---
class DeposePage(ctk.CTkFrame):
    def __init__(self, master, *args, **kwargs):
        super().__init__(master, *args, **kwargs)
        self.base_dir = os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__))
        self.pdf_base = None
        self.pdf_source = None
        self.skip_source = False
        self.final_file = None

        # Dossiers temporaires
        self.temp_dirs = [
            os.path.join(self.base_dir, "PDF_TMP"),
            os.path.join(self.base_dir, "DB_TMP"),
            os.path.join(self.base_dir, "CLEAN_TMP")
        ]

        self.configure(fg_color="#192233")
        self.grid_columnconfigure(0, weight=1)

        # === Titre ===
        ctk.CTkLabel(self, text="D√©pose", font=("Helvetica", 38, "bold"), text_color="#62EDC5")\
            .grid(row=0, column=0, pady=(24, 16))

        # === Zone fichiers ===
        self.file_box = ctk.CTkFrame(self, fg_color="#243148", corner_radius=20)
        self.file_box.grid(row=1, column=0, padx=80, pady=(0, 18), sticky="ew")

        ctk.CTkLabel(self.file_box, text="S√©lectionnez vos fichiers PDF",
                     font=("Arial", 20), text_color="#62EDC5").pack(pady=10)

        # Base
        ctk.CTkButton(self.file_box, text="Choisir PDF Base", font=("Arial", 16),
                      fg_color="#415AA2", command=self.select_pdf_base).pack(pady=4)
        self.label_base = ctk.CTkLabel(self.file_box, text="Non s√©lectionn√©", font=("Arial", 14),
                                       text_color="#F0D48A", wraplength=900)
        self.label_base.pack()

        # Source
        ctk.CTkButton(self.file_box, text="Choisir PDF Source", font=("Arial", 16),
                      fg_color="#417AA2", command=self.select_pdf_source).pack(pady=4)
        self.label_source = ctk.CTkLabel(self.file_box, text="Non s√©lectionn√©", font=("Arial", 14),
                                         text_color="#F0D48A", wraplength=900)
        self.label_source.pack()

        # Passer source
        self.skip_btn = ctk.CTkButton(self.file_box, text="Passer PDF Source",
                                      font=("Arial", 14), fg_color="#666666",
                                      command=self.skip_source_file)
        self.skip_btn.pack(pady=6)

        # Cercle progression
        self.progress_circle = CircularProgress(self, size=100, fg="#62EDC5")
        self.progress_circle.grid(row=2, column=0, pady=(0, 10))
        self.progress_circle.grid_remove()

        # Bouton start (vert)
        self.start_btn = ctk.CTkButton(self, text="üöÄ Lancer le traitement",
                                       font=("Arial", 22, "bold"),
                                       fg_color="#62EDC5", text_color="#112232",
                                       hover_color="#36D399", corner_radius=36, height=64,
                                       state="disabled", command=self.start_process)
        self.start_btn.grid(row=3, column=0, pady=26, padx=220, sticky="ew")

        # Label progression
        self.progress_label = ctk.CTkLabel(self, text="", font=("Arial", 18, "bold"), text_color="#A8F0E2")
        self.progress_label.grid(row=4, column=0, pady=(10, 10))

        # Bouton t√©l√©chargement (jaune)
        self.download_btn = ctk.CTkButton(self, text="üì• T√©l√©charger R√©sultat FINAL.xlsx",
                                          font=("Arial", 20, "bold"),
                                          fg_color="#FFD966", text_color="#112232",
                                          hover_color="#E6C200", corner_radius=36,
                                          height=54, command=self.download_results)
        self.download_btn.grid(row=5, column=0, pady=(20, 20))
        self.download_btn.grid_remove()

        # Bouton terminer (rouge) ‚Äî affich√© uniquement apr√®s t√©l√©chargement
        self.finish_btn = ctk.CTkButton(self, text="‚úÖ Terminer",
                                        font=("Arial", 22, "bold"),
                                        fg_color="#FF4C4C", text_color="white",
                                        hover_color="#CC0000", corner_radius=36, height=64,
                                        command=self.quit_page)
        self.finish_btn.grid(row=6, column=0, pady=(20, 20))
        self.finish_btn.grid_remove()

    # --- S√©lection fichiers ---
    def select_pdf_base(self):
        file = filedialog.askopenfilename(filetypes=[("PDF files", "*.pdf")])
        if file:
            self.pdf_base = file
            self.label_base.configure(text=f"Base: {os.path.basename(file)}")
        self.update_start_button()

    def select_pdf_source(self):
        file = filedialog.askopenfilename(filetypes=[("PDF files", "*.pdf")])
        if file:
            self.pdf_source = file
            self.skip_source = False
            self.label_source.configure(text=f"Source: {os.path.basename(file)}")
        self.update_start_button()

    def skip_source_file(self):
        self.pdf_source = None
        self.skip_source = True
        self.label_source.configure(text="PDF source ignor√© ‚úÖ")
        self.update_start_button()

    def update_start_button(self):
        if self.pdf_base and (self.pdf_source or self.skip_source):
            self.start_btn.configure(state="normal")
        else:
            self.start_btn.configure(state="disabled")

    # --- Lancer le traitement ---
    def start_process(self):
        start_global = time.time()
        self.start_btn.configure(state="disabled")
        self.progress_circle.grid()
        self.progress_circle.set(0.0)
        self.update()

        # Nettoyer / recr√©er dossiers temporaires
        for d in self.temp_dirs:
            if os.path.exists(d):
                shutil.rmtree(d)
            os.makedirs(d, exist_ok=True)

        # Copier fichiers
        shutil.copy(self.pdf_base, os.path.join(self.temp_dirs[0], "base.pdf"))
        if self.pdf_source:
            shutil.copy(self.pdf_source, os.path.join(self.temp_dirs[0], "source.pdf"))

        # √âtape 1
        self.progress_label.configure(text="‚è≥ Conversion PDF...")
        self.update()
        convert_pdf_folder(self.temp_dirs[0], self.temp_dirs[1])
        self.progress_circle.set(0.33)

        # √âtape 2
        self.progress_label.configure(text="‚è≥ Classification / Nettoyage...")
        self.update()
        Traitement_2(self.temp_dirs[1], self.temp_dirs[2])
        self.progress_circle.set(0.66)

        # √âtape 3
        self.progress_label.configure(text="‚è≥ Extraction Excel...")
        self.update()
        Traitemnet_3(self.temp_dirs[2])   # g√©n√®re FINAL.xlsx
        self.final_file = os.path.join(os.getcwd(), "FINAL.xlsx")
        self.progress_circle.set(1.0)

        elapsed = time.time() - start_global
        mins, secs = divmod(int(elapsed), 60)
        self.progress_label.configure(text=f"‚úÖ Termin√© en {mins}m {secs}s")

        self.download_btn.grid()

    def download_results(self):
        if not self.final_file or not os.path.exists(self.final_file):
            self.progress_label.configure(text="‚ö†Ô∏è Aucun fichier FINAL.xlsx trouv√©.")
            return
        save_path = filedialog.asksaveasfilename(defaultextension=".xlsx",
                                                 initialfile=os.path.basename(self.final_file))
        if save_path:
            shutil.copy(self.final_file, save_path)
            self.progress_label.configure(text="üì• FINAL.xlsx t√©l√©charg√© ‚úÖ")
            self.finish_btn.grid()  # afficher le bouton Terminer uniquement apr√®s t√©l√©chargement

    def quit_page(self):
        # Supprimer tous les dossiers temporaires
        for d in self.temp_dirs:
            shutil.rmtree(d, ignore_errors=True)
        if self.final_file and os.path.exists(self.final_file):
            os.remove(self.final_file)  # supprimer FINAL.xlsx aussi
        self.master.destroy()


# --- MAIN ---
if __name__ == "__main__":
    ctk.set_appearance_mode("dark")
    ctk.set_default_color_theme("dark-blue")
    root = ctk.CTk()
    root.title("D√©pose")
    root.geometry("1200x820")
    page = DeposePage(root)
    page.pack(fill="both", expand=True)
    root.mainloop()
